   20: %%%----------------------------------------------------------------
   21: %%% Purpose: Test suite for the 'lists' module.
   22: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   23: 
   24: -module(lists_SUITE).
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: 
   27: %% Test server specific exports
   28: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   29: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   30: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   31: 
   32: %% Test cases must be exported.
   33: -export([member/1, reverse/1,
   34: 	 keymember/1, keysearch_keyfind/1,
   35: 	 keystore/1, keytake/1, keyreplace/1,
   36: 	 append_1/1, append_2/1,
   37: 	 seq_loop/1, seq_2/1, seq_3/1, seq_2_e/1, seq_3_e/1,
   38: 
   39: 	 sublist_2/1, sublist_3/1, sublist_2_e/1, sublist_3_e/1,
   40: 	 flatten_1/1, flatten_2/1, flatten_1_e/1, flatten_2_e/1,
   41: 	 dropwhile/1, takewhile/1,
   42: 	 sort_1/1, merge/1, rmerge/1, sort_rand/1,
   43: 	 usort_1/1, umerge/1, rumerge/1,usort_rand/1,
   44: 	 keymerge/1, rkeymerge/1,
   45: 	 keysort_1/1, keysort_i/1,
   46: 	 keysort_rand/1, keysort_error/1,
   47: 	 ukeymerge/1, rukeymerge/1,
   48: 	 ukeysort_1/1, ukeysort_i/1,
   49: 	 ukeysort_rand/1, ukeysort_error/1,
   50: 	 uniq_1/1, uniq_2/1,
   51: 	 zip_unzip/1, zip_unzip3/1, zipwith/1, zipwith3/1,
   52: 	 zip_fail/1, zip_trim/1, zip_pad/1,
   53: 	 zip3_fail/1, zip3_trim/1, zip3_pad/1,
   54: 	 zipwith_fail/1, zipwith_trim/1, zipwith_pad/1,
   55: 	 zipwith3_fail/1, zipwith3_trim/1, zipwith3_pad/1,
   56: 	 filter_partition/1, 
   57: 	 join/1,
   58: 	 otp_5939/1, otp_6023/1, otp_6606/1, otp_7230/1,
   59: 	 suffix/1, subtract/1, droplast/1, search/1, hof/1,
   60: 	 enumerate/1, error_info/1]).
   61: 
   62: %% Sort randomized lists until stopped.
   63: %%
   64: %% If you update some of the sort or merge functions, you should
   65: %% definitely let sort_loop work for a couple of hours or days. Try
   66: %% both sort_loop/0 and sort_loop/1 with a small argument (30-50 say).
   67: 
   68: -export([sort_loop/0, sort_loop/1, sloop/1]).
   69: 
   70: %%
   71: %% all/1
   72: %%
   73: suite() ->
   74:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   75:      {timetrap,{minutes,4}}].
   76: 
   77: all() -> 
   78:     [{group, append},
   79:      {group, key},
   80:      {group, sort},
   81:      {group, usort},
   82:      {group, keysort},
   83:      {group, ukeysort},
   84:      {group, uniq},
   85:      {group, sublist},
   86:      {group, flatten},
   87:      {group, seq},
   88:      {group, tickets},
   89:      {group, zip},
   90:      {group, misc}].
   91: 
   92: groups() -> 
   93:     [{append, [parallel], [append_1, append_2]},
   94:      {usort, [parallel],
   95:       [umerge, rumerge, usort_1, usort_rand]},
   96:      {keysort, [parallel],
   97:       [keymerge, rkeymerge, keysort_1, keysort_rand,
   98:        keysort_i, keysort_error]},
   99:      {key, [parallel], [keymember, keysearch_keyfind, keystore,
  100: 			keytake, keyreplace]},
  101:      {sort,[parallel],[merge, rmerge, sort_1, sort_rand]},
  102:      {ukeysort, [parallel],
  103:       [ukeymerge, rukeymerge, ukeysort_1, ukeysort_rand,
  104:        ukeysort_i, ukeysort_error]},
  105:      {seq, [parallel], [seq_loop, seq_2, seq_3, seq_2_e, seq_3_e]},
  106:      {sublist, [parallel],
  107:       [sublist_2, sublist_3, sublist_2_e, sublist_3_e]},
  108:      {flatten, [parallel],
  109:       [flatten_1, flatten_2, flatten_1_e, flatten_2_e]},
  110:      {tickets, [parallel], [otp_5939, otp_6023, otp_6606, otp_7230]},
  111:      {zip, [parallel], [zip_unzip, zip_unzip3, zipwith, zipwith3,
  112: 			zip_fail, zip_trim, zip_pad,
  113: 		        zip3_fail, zip3_trim, zip3_pad,
  114: 		        zipwith_fail, zipwith_trim, zipwith_pad,
  115: 		        zipwith3_fail, zipwith3_trim, zipwith3_pad]},
  116:      {uniq, [parallel], [uniq_1, uniq_2]},
  117:      {misc, [parallel], [reverse, member, dropwhile, takewhile,
  118: 			 filter_partition, suffix, subtract, join,
  119: 			 hof, droplast, search, enumerate, error_info]}
  120:     ].
  121: 
  122: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  123:     Config.
  124: 
  125: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  126:     ok.
  127: 
  128: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  129:     Config.
  130: 
  131: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  132:     Config.
  133: 
  134: 
  135: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  136:     Config.
  137: 
  138: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
  139:     ok.
  140: 
  141: %%
  142: %% Test cases starts here.
  143: %%
  144: 
  145: append_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  146:     "abcdef"=lists:append(["abc","def"]),
  147:     [hej, du,[glade, [bagare]]]=
  148: 	lists:append([[hej], [du], [[glade, [bagare]]]]),
  149:     [10, [elem]]=lists:append([[10], [[elem]]]),
  150:     ok.
  151: 
  152: append_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  153:     "abcdef"=lists:append("abc", "def"),
  154:     [hej, du]=lists:append([hej], [du]),
  155:     [10, [elem]]=lists:append([10], [[elem]]),
  156: 
  157:     %% Trapping, both crashing and otherwise.
  158:     [append_trapping_1(N) || N <- lists:seq(0, 20)],
  159: 
  160:     ok.
  161: 
  162: append_trapping_1(N) ->
  163:     List = lists:duplicate(N + (1 bsl N), gurka),
  164:     ImproperList = List ++ crash,
  165: 
  166:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch (ImproperList ++ [])),
  167: 
  168:     [3, 2, 1 | List] = lists:reverse(List ++ [1, 2, 3]),
  169: 
  170:     ok.
  171: 
  172: %% Tests the lists:reverse() implementation. The function is
  173: %% `non-blocking', and only processes a fixed number of elements at a
  174: %% time.
  175: reverse(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  176:     reverse_test(0),
  177:     reverse_test(1),
  178:     reverse_test(2),
  179:     reverse_test(128),
  180:     reverse_test(256),
  181:     reverse_test(1000),
  182:     reverse_test(1998),
  183:     reverse_test(1999),
  184:     reverse_test(2000),
  185:     reverse_test(2001),
  186:     reverse_test(3998),
  187:     reverse_test(3999),
  188:     reverse_test(4000),
  189:     reverse_test(4001),
  190:     reverse_test(60001),
  191:     reverse_test(100007),
  192:     ok.
  193: 
  194: reverse_test(0) ->
  195:     case lists:reverse([]) of
  196: 	[] ->
  197: 	    ok;
  198: 	_Other ->
  199: 	    error
  200:     end;
  201: reverse_test(Num) ->
  202:     List0 = ['The Element'|lists:duplicate(Num, 'Ele')],
  203:     List = lists:reverse(List0),
  204:     ['Ele'|_] = List,
  205:     'The Element' = lists:last(List),
  206:     List0 = lists:reverse(List),
  207:     ok.
  208: 
  209: %% Test the lists:member() implementation.  This test case depends on
  210: %% lists:reverse() to work, wich is tested in a separate test case.
  211: member(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  212:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch lists:member(45, {a,b,c})),
  213:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch lists:member(45, [0|non_list_tail])),
  214:     false = lists:member(4233, []),
  215:     member_test(1),
  216:     member_test(100),
  217:     member_test(256),
  218:     member_test(1000),
  219:     member_test(1998),
  220:     member_test(1999),
  221:     member_test(2000),
  222:     member_test(2001),
  223:     member_test(3998),
  224:     member_test(3999),
  225:     member_test(4000),
  226:     member_test(4001),
  227:     member_test(100008),
  228:     ok.
  229: 
  230: member_test(Num) ->
  231:     List0 = ['The Element'|lists:duplicate(Num, 'Elem')],
  232:     true = lists:member('The Element', List0),
  233:     true = lists:member('Elem', List0),
  234:     false = lists:member(arne_anka, List0),
  235:     false = lists:member({a,b,c}, List0),
  236:     List = lists:reverse(List0),
  237:     true = lists:member('The Element', List),
  238:     true = lists:member('Elem', List),
  239:     false = lists:member(arne_anka, List),
  240:     false = lists:member({a,b,c}, List).
  241: 
  242: keymember(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  243:     false = lists:keymember(anything_goes, 1, []),
  244:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch lists:keymember(anything_goes, -1, [])),
  245:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch lists:keymember(anything_goes, 0, [])),
  246:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch lists:keymember(anything_goes, 1, {1,2,3})),
  247:     List = [{52.0,a},{-19,b,c},{37.5,d},an_atom,42.0,{39},{45,{x,y,z}}],
  248: 
  249:     false = lists:keymember(333, 5, List),
  250:     false = lists:keymember(333, 999, List),
  251:     false = lists:keymember(37, 1, List),
  252: 
  253:     true = lists:keymember(52.0, 1, List),
  254:     true = lists:keymember(52, 1, List),
  255:     true = lists:keymember(-19, 1, List),
  256:     true = lists:keymember(-19.0, 1, List),
  257:     true = lists:keymember(37.5, 1, List),
  258:     true = lists:keymember(39, 1, List),
  259:     true = lists:keymember(39.0, 1, List),
  260:     true = lists:keymember(45, 1, List),
  261:     true = lists:keymember(45.0, 1, List),
  262: 
  263:     true = lists:keymember(a, 2, List),
  264:     true = lists:keymember(b, 2, List),
  265:     true = lists:keymember(c, 3, List),
  266:     true = lists:keymember(d, 2, List),
  267:     true = lists:keymember({x,y,z}, 2, List),
  268: 
  269:     Long0 = lists:seq(1, 100007),
  270:     false = lists:keymember(kalle, 1, Long0),
  271:     Long = lists:foldl(fun(E, A) -> [{1/E,E}|A] end, [], Long0),
  272:     true = lists:keymember(1, 2, Long),
  273:     true = lists:keymember(2, 2, Long),
  274:     true = lists:keymember(1.0, 2, Long),
  275:     true = lists:keymember(2.0, 2, Long),
  276:     true = lists:keymember(100006, 2, Long),
  277:     ok.
  278: 
  279: keysearch_keyfind(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  280:     false = key_search_find(anything_goes, 1, []),
  281:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch key_search_find(anything_goes, -1, [])),
  282:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch key_search_find(anything_goes, 0, [])),
  283:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch key_search_find(anything_goes, 1, {1,2,3})),
  284: 
  285:     First = {x,42.0},
  286:     Second = {y,-77},
  287:     Third = {z,[a,b,c],{5.0}},
  288:     List = [First,Second,Third],
  289: 
  290:     false = key_search_find(333, 1, []),
  291:     false = key_search_find(333, 5, List),
  292:     false = key_search_find(333, 999, List),
  293:     false = key_search_find(37, 1, List),
  294: 
  295:     {value,First} = key_search_find(42, 2, List),
  296:     {value,First} = key_search_find(42.0, 2, List),
  297: 
  298:     {value,Second} = key_search_find(-77, 2, List),
  299:     {value,Second} = key_search_find(-77.0, 2, List),
  300: 
  301:     {value,Third} = key_search_find(z, 1, List),
  302:     {value,Third} = key_search_find([a,b,c], 2, List),
  303:     {value,Third} = key_search_find({5}, 3, List),
  304:     {value,Third} = key_search_find({5.0}, 3, List),
  305: 
  306:     Long0 = lists:seq(1, 100007),
  307:     false = key_search_find(kalle, 1, Long0),
  308:     Long = lists:foldl(fun(E, A) -> [{1/E,float(E)}|A] end, [], Long0),
  309:     {value,{_,1.0}} = key_search_find(1, 2, Long),
  310:     {value,{_,1.0}} = key_search_find(1.0, 2, Long),
  311:     {value,{_,2.0}} = key_search_find(2, 2, Long),
  312:     {value,{_,2.0}} = key_search_find(2.0, 2, Long),
  313:     {value,{_,33988.0}} = key_search_find(33988, 2, Long),
  314:     {value,{_,33988.0}} = key_search_find(33988.0, 2, Long),
  315:     ok.
  316: 
  317: %% Test both lists:keysearch/3 and lists:keyfind/3. The only
  318: %% difference between these two functions is that lists:keysearch/3
  319: %% wraps a successfully returned tuple in a value tuple.
  320: %%
  321: key_search_find(Key, Pos, List) ->
  322:     case lists:keyfind(Key, Pos, List) of
  323: 	false ->
  324: 	    false = lists:keysearch(Key, Pos, List);
  325: 	Tuple when is_tuple(Tuple) ->
  326: 	    {value,Tuple} = lists:keysearch(Key, Pos, List)
  327:     end.
  328: 
  329: dropwhile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  330:     F = fun(C) -> C =:= $@ end,
  331: 
  332:     [] = lists:dropwhile(F, []),
  333:     [a] = lists:dropwhile(F, [a]),
  334:     [a,b] = lists:dropwhile(F, [a,b]),
  335:     [a,b,c] = lists:dropwhile(F, [a,b,c]),
  336: 
  337:     [] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@]),
  338:     [] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,$@]),
  339:     [a,$@] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,a,$@]),
  340: 
  341:     [$k] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,$k]),
  342:     [$k,$l] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,$@,$k,$l]),
  343:     [a] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,$@,$@,a]),
  344: 
  345:     [a,$@,b] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,a,$@,b]),
  346:     [a,$@,b] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,$@,a,$@,b]),
  347:     [a,$@,b] = lists:dropwhile(F, [$@,$@,$@,a,$@,b]),
  348: 
  349:     Long = lists:seq(1, 1024),
  350:     Shorter = lists:seq(800, 1024),
  351: 
  352:     Shorter = lists:dropwhile(fun(E) -> E < 800 end, Long),
  353: 
  354:     ok.
  355: 
  356: takewhile(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  357:     F = fun(C) -> C =/= $@ end,
  358: 
  359:     [] = lists:takewhile(F, []),
  360:     [a] = lists:takewhile(F, [a]),
  361:     [a,b] = lists:takewhile(F, [a,b]),
  362:     [a,b,c] = lists:takewhile(F, [a,b,c]),
  363: 
  364:     [] = lists:takewhile(F, [$@]),
  365:     [] = lists:takewhile(F, [$@,$@]),
  366:     [a] = lists:takewhile(F, [a,$@]),
  367: 
  368:     [$k] = lists:takewhile(F, [$k,$@]),
  369:     [$k,$l] = lists:takewhile(F, [$k,$l,$@,$@]),
  370:     [a] = lists:takewhile(F, [a,$@,$@,$@]),
  371: 
  372:     [] = lists:takewhile(F, [$@,a,$@,b]),
  373:     [] = lists:takewhile(F, [$@,$@,a,$@,b]),
  374:     [] = lists:takewhile(F, [$@,$@,$@,a,$@,b]),
  375: 
  376:     Long = lists:seq(1, 1024),
  377:     Shorter = lists:seq(1, 400),
  378: 
  379:     Shorter = lists:takewhile(fun(E) -> E =< 400 end, Long),
  380: 
  381:     ok.
  382: 
  383: keystore(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  384:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keystore(key, 0, [], {1})),
  385:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keystore(key, 1, {}, {})),
  386:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keystore(key, 1, {a,b}, {})),
  387:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keystore(a, 2, [{1,a}], b)),
  388:     T = {k,17},
  389:     [T] = lists:keystore(a, 2, [], T),
  390:     [{1,a},{2,b},{k,17}] = lists:keystore(c, 2, [{1,a},{2,b}],T),
  391:     L = [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}],
  392:     [{k,17},{2,b},{3,c}] = lists:keystore(a, 2, L, T),
  393:     [{1,a},{k,17},{3,c}] = lists:keystore(b, 2, L, T),
  394:     [{1,a},{2,b},{k,17}] = lists:keystore(c, 2, L, T),
  395:     [{2,b}] = lists:keystore(a, 2, [{1,a}], {2,b}),
  396:     [{1,a}] = lists:keystore(foo, 1, [], {1,a}),
  397:     ok.
  398: 
  399: keytake(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  400:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keytake(key, 0, [])),
  401:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keytake(key, 1, {})),
  402:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keytake(key, 1, {a,b})),
  403:     false = lists:keytake(key, 2, [{a}]),
  404:     false = lists:keytake(key, 1, [a]),
  405:     false = lists:keytake(k, 1, []),
  406:     false = lists:keytake(k, 1, [{a},{b},{c}]),
  407:     L = [{a,1},{b,2},{c,3}],
  408:     {value,{a,1},[{b,2},{c,3}]} = lists:keytake(1, 2, L),
  409:     {value,{b,2},[{a,1},{c,3}]} = lists:keytake(2, 2, L),
  410:     {value,{c,3},[{a,1},{b,2}]} = lists:keytake(3, 2, L),
  411:     false = lists:keytake(4, 2, L),
  412:     ok.
  413: 
  414: %% Test lists:keyreplace/4.
  415: keyreplace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  416:     [{new,42}] = lists:keyreplace(k, 1, [{k,1}], {new,42}),
  417:     [atom,{new,a,b}] = lists:keyreplace(k, 1, [atom,{k,1}], {new,a,b}),
  418:     [a,{x,y,z}] = lists:keyreplace(a, 5, [a,{x,y,z}], {no,use}),
  419: 
  420:     %% Error cases.
  421:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keyreplace(k, 1, [], not_tuple)),
  422:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:keyreplace(k, 0, [], {a,b})),
  423:     ok.
  424: 
  425: merge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  426: 
  427:     Singleton = id([a, b, c]),
  428: 
  429:     %% merge list of lists
  430:     [] = lists:merge([]),
  431:     [] = lists:merge([[]]),
  432:     [] = lists:merge([[],[]]),
  433:     [] = lists:merge([[],[],[]]),
  434:     [1] = lists:merge([[1]]),
  435:     [1,1,2,2] = lists:merge([[1,2],[1,2]]),
  436:     [1] = lists:merge([[1],[],[]]),
  437:     [1] = lists:merge([[],[1],[]]),
  438:     [1] = lists:merge([[],[],[1]]),
  439:     [1,2] = lists:merge([[1],[2],[]]),
  440:     [1,2] = lists:merge([[1],[],[2]]),
  441:     [1,2] = lists:merge([[],[1],[2]]),
  442:     [1,2,3,4,5,6] = lists:merge([[1,2],[],[5,6],[],[3,4],[]]),
  443:     [1,2,3,4] = lists:merge([[4],[3],[2],[1]]),
  444:     [1,2,3,4,5] = lists:merge([[1],[2],[3],[4],[5]]),
  445:     [1,2,3,4,5,6] = lists:merge([[1],[2],[3],[4],[5],[6]]),
  446:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9] =
  447: 	lists:merge([[1],[2],[3],[4],[5],[6],[7],[8],[9]]),
  448:     Seq = lists:seq(1,100),
  449:     true = Seq == lists:merge(lists:map(fun(E) -> [E] end, Seq)),
  450: 
  451:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge([Singleton])),
  452:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge([Singleton, []])),
  453:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge([[], Singleton])),
  454:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge([Singleton, [], []])),
  455:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge([[], Singleton, []])),
  456:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge([[], [], Singleton])),
  457: 
  458:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a])),
  459:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, b])),
  460:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, []])),
  461:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[], b])),
  462:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, [1, 2, 3]])),
  463:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[1, 2, 3], b])),
  464:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, b, c])),
  465:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, b, []])),
  466:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, [], c])),
  467:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, [], []])),
  468:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[], b, c])),
  469:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[], b, []])),
  470:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[], [], c])),
  471:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, b, [1, 2, 3]])),
  472:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, [1, 2, 3], c])),
  473:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([a, [1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6]])),
  474:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[1, 2, 3], b, c])),
  475:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[1, 2, 3], b, [4, 5, 6]])),
  476:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([[1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], c])),
  477: 
  478:     Two = [1,2],
  479:     Six = [1,2,3,4,5,6],
  480: 
  481:     %% 2-way merge
  482:     [] = lists:merge([], []),
  483:     Two = lists:merge(Two, []),
  484:     Two = lists:merge([], Two),
  485:     Six = lists:merge([1,3,5], [2,4,6]),
  486:     Six = lists:merge([2,4,6], [1,3,5]),
  487:     Six = lists:merge([1,2,3], [4,5,6]),
  488:     Six = lists:merge([4,5,6], [1,2,3]),
  489:     Six = lists:merge([1,2,5],[3,4,6]),
  490:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:merge([1,3,5,7], [2]),
  491:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:merge([1,3,5,7], [2,4]),
  492:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:merge([1,3,5,7], [2,4,6]),
  493:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:merge([2], [1,3,5,7]),
  494:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:merge([2,4], [1,3,5,7]),
  495:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:merge([2,4,6], [1,3,5,7]),
  496: 
  497:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge([], Singleton)),
  498:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge(Singleton, [])),
  499: 
  500:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge(a, b)),
  501:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge(a, [])),
  502:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([], b)),
  503:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge(a, [1, 2, 3])),
  504:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge([1, 2, 3], b)),
  505: 
  506:     %% 3-way merge
  507:     [] = lists:merge3([], [], []),
  508:     Two = lists:merge3([], [], Two),
  509:     Two = lists:merge3([], Two, []),
  510:     Two = lists:merge3(Two, [], []),
  511:     Six = lists:merge3([], [1,3,5], [2,4,6]),
  512:     Six = lists:merge3([1,3,5], [], [2,4,6]),
  513:     Six = lists:merge3([1,3,5], [2,4,6], []),
  514:     Nine = lists:merge3([1,4,7],[2,5,8],[3,6,9]),
  515:     Nine = lists:merge3([1,4,7],[3,6,9],[2,5,8]),
  516:     Nine = lists:merge3([3,6,9],[1,4,7],[2,5,8]),
  517:     Nine = lists:merge3([4,5,6],[1,2,3],[7,8,9]),
  518:     Nine = lists:merge3([1,2,3],[4,5,6],[7,8,9]),
  519:     Nine = lists:merge3([7,8,9],[4,5,6],[1,2,3]),
  520:     Nine = lists:merge3([4,5,6],[7,8,9],[1,2,3]),
  521: 
  522:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge3([], [], Singleton)),
  523:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge3([], Singleton, [])),
  524:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:merge3(Singleton, [], [])),
  525: 
  526:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3(a, b, c)),
  527:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3(a, b, [])),
  528:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3(a, [], c)),
  529:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3(a, [], [])),
  530:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3([], b, [])),
  531:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3([], [], c)),
  532:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3(a, b, [1, 2, 3])),
  533:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3(a, [1, 2, 3], c)),
  534:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3(a, [1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6])),
  535:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3([1, 2, 3], b, [4, 5, 6])),
  536:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge3([1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], c)),
  537: 
  538:     ok.
  539: 
  540: %% reverse merge functions
  541: rmerge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  542: 
  543:     Singleton = id([a, b, c]),
  544:     Two = [2,1],
  545:     Six = [6,5,4,3,2,1],
  546: 
  547:     %% 2-way reversed merge
  548:     [] = lists:rmerge([], []),
  549:     Two = lists:rmerge(Two, []),
  550:     Two = lists:rmerge([], Two),
  551:     Six = lists:rmerge([5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
  552:     Six = lists:rmerge([6,4,2], [5,3,1]),
  553:     Six = lists:rmerge([3,2,1], [6,5,4]),
  554:     Six = lists:rmerge([6,5,4], [3,2,1]),
  555:     Six = lists:rmerge([4,3,2],[6,5,1]),
  556:     [7,6,5,3,1] = lists:rmerge([7,5,3,1], [6]),
  557:     [7,6,5,4,3,1] = lists:rmerge([7,5,3,1], [6,4]),
  558:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rmerge([7,5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
  559:     [7,5,3,2,1] = lists:rmerge([2], [7,5,3,1]),
  560:     [7,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rmerge([4,2], [7,5,3,1]),
  561:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rmerge([6,4,2], [7,5,3,1]),
  562: 
  563:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rmerge([], Singleton)),
  564:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rmerge(Singleton, [])),
  565: 
  566:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge(a, b)),
  567:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge(a, [])),
  568:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge([], b)),
  569:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge(a, [1, 2, 3])),
  570:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge([1, 2, 3], b)),
  571: 
  572:     Nine = [9,8,7,6,5,4,3,2,1],
  573: 
  574:     %% 3-way reversed merge
  575:     [] = lists:rmerge3([], [], []),
  576:     Two = lists:rmerge3([], [], Two),
  577:     Two = lists:rmerge3([], Two, []),
  578:     Two = lists:rmerge3(Two, [], []),
  579:     Six = lists:rmerge3([], [5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
  580:     Six = lists:rmerge3([5,3,1], [], [6,4,2]),
  581:     Six = lists:rmerge3([5,3,1], [6,4,2], []),
  582:     Nine = lists:rmerge3([7,4,1],[8,5,2],[9,6,3]),
  583:     Nine = lists:rmerge3([7,4,1],[9,6,3],[8,5,2]),
  584:     Nine = lists:rmerge3([9,6,3],[7,4,1],[8,5,2]),
  585:     Nine = lists:rmerge3([6,5,4],[3,2,1],[9,8,7]),
  586:     Nine = lists:rmerge3([3,2,1],[6,5,4],[9,8,7]),
  587:     Nine = lists:rmerge3([9,8,7],[6,5,4],[3,2,1]),
  588:     Nine = lists:rmerge3([6,5,4],[9,8,7],[3,2,1]),
  589: 
  590:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rmerge3([], [], Singleton)),
  591:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rmerge3([], Singleton, [])),
  592:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rmerge3(Singleton, [], [])),
  593: 
  594:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3(a, b, c)),
  595:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3(a, b, [])),
  596:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3(a, [], c)),
  597:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3(a, [], [])),
  598:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3([], b, [])),
  599:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3([], [], c)),
  600:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3(a, b, [1, 2, 3])),
  601:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3(a, [1, 2, 3], c)),
  602:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3(a, [1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6])),
  603:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3([1, 2, 3], b, [4, 5, 6])),
  604:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge3([1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], c)),
  605: 
  606:     ok.
  607: 
  608: sort_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  609:     [] = lists:sort([]),
  610:     [a] = lists:sort([a]),
  611:     [a,a] = lists:sort([a,a]),
  612:     [a,b] = lists:sort([a,b]),
  613:     [a,b] = lists:sort([b,a]),
  614:     [1,1] = lists:sort([1,1]),
  615:     [1,1,2,3] = lists:sort([1,1,3,2]),
  616:     [1,2,3,3] = lists:sort([3,3,1,2]),
  617:     [1,1,1,1] = lists:sort([1,1,1,1]),
  618:     [1,1,1,2,2,2,3,3,3] = lists:sort([3,3,3,2,2,2,1,1,1]),
  619:     [1,1,1,2,2,2,3,3,3] = lists:sort([1,1,1,2,2,2,3,3,3]),
  620: 
  621:     lists:foreach(fun check/1, perms([1,2,3])),
  622:     lists:foreach(fun check/1, perms([1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8])),
  623:     ok.
  624: 
  625: %% sort/1 on big randomized lists
  626: sort_rand(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  627:     ok = check(biglist(10)),
  628:     ok = check(biglist(100)),
  629:     ok = check(biglist(1000)),
  630:     ok = check(biglist(10000)),
  631:     ok.
  632: 
  633: check([]) ->
  634:     ok;
  635: check(L) ->
  636:     S = lists:sort(L),
  637:     case {length(L) == length(S), check(hd(S), tl(S))} of
  638: 	{true,ok} ->
  639: 	    ok;
  640: 	_ ->
  641: 	    io:format("~w~n", [L]),
  642: 	    erlang:error(check)
  643:     end.
  644: 
  645: check(_A, []) ->
  646:     ok;
  647: check(A, [B | L]) when A =< B ->
  648:     check(B, L);
  649: check(_A, _L) ->
  650:     no.
  651: 
  652: usort_1(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  653:     [] = lists:usort([]),
  654:     [1] = lists:usort([1]),
  655:     [1] = lists:usort([1,1]),
  656:     [1] = lists:usort([1,1,1,1,1]),
  657:     [1,2] = lists:usort([1,2]),
  658:     [1,2] = lists:usort([1,2,1]),
  659:     [1,2] = lists:usort([1,2,2]),
  660:     [1,2,3] = lists:usort([1,3,2]),
  661:     [1,3] = lists:usort([3,1,3]),
  662:     [0,1,3] = lists:usort([3,1,0]),
  663:     [1,2,3] = lists:usort([3,1,2]),
  664:     [1,2] = lists:usort([2,1,1]),
  665:     [1,2] = lists:usort([2,1]),
  666:     [0,3,4,8,9] = lists:usort([3,8,9,0,9,4]),
  667: 
  668:     lists:foreach(fun ucheck/1, perms([1,2,3])),
  669:     lists:foreach(fun ucheck/1, perms([1,2,3,4,5,6,2,1])),
  670: 
  671:     ok.
  672: 
  673: umerge(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  674:     Singleton = id([a, b, c]),
  675: 
  676:     %% merge list of lists
  677:     [] = lists:umerge([]),
  678:     [] = lists:umerge([[]]),
  679:     [] = lists:umerge([[],[]]),
  680:     [] = lists:umerge([[],[],[]]),
  681:     [1] = lists:umerge([[1]]),
  682:     [1,2] = lists:umerge([[1,2],[1,2]]),
  683:     [1] = lists:umerge([[1],[],[]]),
  684:     [1] = lists:umerge([[],[1],[]]),
  685:     [1] = lists:umerge([[],[],[1]]),
  686:     [1,2] = lists:umerge([[1],[2],[]]),
  687:     [1,2] = lists:umerge([[1],[],[2]]),
  688:     [1,2] = lists:umerge([[],[1],[2]]),
  689:     [1,2,3,4,5,6] = lists:umerge([[1,2],[],[5,6],[],[3,4],[]]),
  690:     [1,2,3,4] = lists:umerge([[4],[3],[2],[1]]),
  691:     [1,2,3,4,5] = lists:umerge([[1],[2],[3],[4],[5]]),
  692:     [1,2,3,4,5,6] = lists:umerge([[1],[2],[3],[4],[5],[6]]),
  693:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9] =
  694:         lists:umerge([[1],[2],[3],[4],[5],[6],[7],[8],[9]]),
  695:     [1,2,4,6,8] = lists:umerge([[1,2],[2,4,6,8]]),
  696:     Seq = lists:seq(1,100),
  697:     true = Seq == lists:umerge(lists:map(fun(E) -> [E] end, Seq)),
  698: 
  699:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge([Singleton])),
  700:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge([Singleton, []])),
  701:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge([[], Singleton])),
  702:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge([Singleton, [], []])),
  703:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge([[], Singleton, []])),
  704:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge([[], [], Singleton])),
  705: 
  706:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a])),
  707:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, b])),
  708:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, []])),
  709:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[], b])),
  710:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, [1, 2, 3]])),
  711:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[1, 2, 3], b])),
  712:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, b, c])),
  713:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, b, []])),
  714:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, [], c])),
  715:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, [], []])),
  716:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[], b, c])),
  717:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[], b, []])),
  718:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[], [], c])),
  719:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, b, [1, 2, 3]])),
  720:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, [1, 2, 3], c])),
  721:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([a, [1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6]])),
  722:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[1, 2, 3], b, c])),
  723:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[1, 2, 3], b, [4, 5, 6]])),
  724:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([[1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], c])),
  725: 
  726:     Two = [1,2],
  727:     Six = [1,2,3,4,5,6],
  728: 
  729:     %% 2-way unique merge
  730:     [] = lists:umerge([], []),
  731:     Two = lists:umerge(Two, []),
  732:     Two = lists:umerge([], Two),
  733:     Six = lists:umerge([1,3,5], [2,4,6]),
  734:     Six = lists:umerge([2,4,6], [1,3,5]),
  735:     Six = lists:umerge([1,2,3], [4,5,6]),
  736:     Six = lists:umerge([4,5,6], [1,2,3]),
  737:     Six = lists:umerge([1,2,5],[3,4,6]),
  738:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:umerge([1,3,5,7], [2]),
  739:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:umerge([1,3,5,7], [2,4]),
  740:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:umerge([1,3,5,7], [2,4,6]),
  741:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:umerge([2], [1,3,5,7]),
  742:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:umerge([2,4], [1,3,5,7]),
  743:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:umerge([2,4,6], [1,3,5,7]),
  744: 
  745:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:umerge([1,2,3,5,7], [2]),
  746:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:umerge([1,2,3,4,5,7], [2,4]),
  747:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:umerge([1,2,3,4,5,6,7], [2,4,6]),
  748:     [1,2,3,5,7] = lists:umerge([2], [1,2,3,5,7]),
  749:     [1,2,3,4,5,7] = lists:umerge([2,4], [1,2,3,4,5,7]),
  750:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7] = lists:umerge([2,4,6], [1,2,3,4,5,6,7]),
  751: 
  752:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge([], Singleton)),
  753:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge(Singleton, [])),
  754: 
  755:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge(a, b)),
  756:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge(a, [])),
  757:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([], b)),
  758:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge(a, [1, 2, 3])),
  759:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge([1, 2, 3], b)),
  760: 
  761:     %% 3-way unique merge
  762:     [] = lists:umerge3([], [], []),
  763:     Two = lists:umerge3([], [], Two),
  764:     Two = lists:umerge3([], Two, []),
  765:     Two = lists:umerge3(Two, [], []),
  766:     Six = lists:umerge3([], [1,3,5], [2,4,6]),
  767:     Six = lists:umerge3([1,3,5], [], [2,4,6]),
  768:     Six = lists:umerge3([1,3,5], [2,4,6], []),
  769:     Nine = lists:umerge3([1,4,7],[2,5,8],[3,6,9]),
  770:     Nine = lists:umerge3([1,4,7],[3,6,9],[2,5,8]),
  771:     Nine = lists:umerge3([3,6,9],[1,4,7],[2,5,8]),
  772:     Nine = lists:umerge3([4,5,6],[1,2,3],[7,8,9]),
  773:     Nine = lists:umerge3([1,2,3],[4,5,6],[7,8,9]),
  774:     Nine = lists:umerge3([7,8,9],[4,5,6],[1,2,3]),
  775:     Nine = lists:umerge3([4,5,6],[7,8,9],[1,2,3]),
  776: 
  777:     [1,2,3] = lists:umerge3([1,2,3],[1,2,3],[1,2,3]),
  778:     [1,2,3,4] = lists:umerge3([2,3,4],[1,2,3],[2,3,4]),
  779:     [1,2,3] = lists:umerge3([1,2,3],[2,3],[1,2,3]),
  780:     [1,2,3,4] = lists:umerge3([2,3,4],[3,4],[1,2,3]),
  781: 
  782:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge3([], [], Singleton)),
  783:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge3([], Singleton, [])),
  784:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:umerge3(Singleton, [], [])),
  785: 
  786:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3(a, b, c)),
  787:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3(a, b, [])),
  788:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3(a, [], c)),
  789:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3(a, [], [])),
  790:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3([], b, [])),
  791:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3([], [], c)),
  792:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3(a, b, [1, 2, 3])),
  793:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3(a, [1, 2, 3], c)),
  794:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3(a, [1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6])),
  795:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3([1, 2, 3], b, [4, 5, 6])),
  796:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge3([1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], c)),
  797: 
  798:     ok.
  799: 
  800: rumerge(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
  801:     Singleton = id([a, b, c]),
  802: 
  803:     Two = [2,1],
  804:     Six = [6,5,4,3,2,1],
  805: 
  806:     %% 2-way reversed unique merge
  807:     [] = lists:rumerge([], []),
  808:     Two = lists:rumerge(Two, []),
  809:     Two = lists:rumerge([], Two),
  810:     Six = lists:rumerge([5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
  811:     Six = lists:rumerge([6,4,2], [5,3,1]),
  812:     Six = lists:rumerge([3,2,1], [6,5,4]),
  813:     Six = lists:rumerge([6,5,4], [3,2,1]),
  814:     Six = lists:rumerge([4,3,2],[6,5,1]),
  815:     [7,6,5,3,1] = lists:rumerge([7,5,3,1], [6]),
  816:     [7,6,5,4,3,1] = lists:rumerge([7,5,3,1], [6,4]),
  817:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([7,5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
  818:     [7,5,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([2], [7,5,3,1]),
  819:     [7,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([4,2], [7,5,3,1]),
  820:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([6,4,2], [7,5,3,1]),
  821: 
  822:     [7,6,5,3,1] = lists:rumerge([7,6,5,3,1], [6]),
  823:     [7,6,5,4,3,1] = lists:rumerge([7,6,5,4,3,1], [6,4]),
  824:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([7,6,5,4,3,2,1], [6,4,2]),
  825:     [7,5,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([2], [7,5,3,2,1]),
  826:     [7,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([4,2], [7,5,4,3,2,1]),
  827:     [7,6,5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge([6,4,2], [7,6,5,4,3,2,1]),
  828: 
  829:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rumerge([], Singleton)),
  830:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rumerge(Singleton, [])),
  831: 
  832:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge(a, b)),
  833:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge(a, [])),
  834:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge([], b)),
  835:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge(a, [1, 2, 3])),
  836:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge([1, 2, 3], b)),
  837: 
  838:     Nine = [9,8,7,6,5,4,3,2,1],
  839: 
  840:     %% 3-way reversed unique merge
  841:     [] = lists:rumerge3([], [], []),
  842:     Two = lists:rumerge3([], [], Two),
  843:     Two = lists:rumerge3([], Two, []),
  844:     Two = lists:rumerge3(Two, [], []),
  845:     Six = lists:rumerge3([], [5,3,1], [6,4,2]),
  846:     Six = lists:rumerge3([5,3,1], [], [6,4,2]),
  847:     Six = lists:rumerge3([5,3,1], [6,4,2], []),
  848:     Nine = lists:rumerge3([7,4,1],[8,5,2],[9,6,3]),
  849:     Nine = lists:rumerge3([7,4,1],[9,6,3],[8,5,2]),
  850:     Nine = lists:rumerge3([9,6,3],[7,4,1],[8,5,2]),
  851:     Nine = lists:rumerge3([6,5,4],[3,2,1],[9,8,7]),
  852:     Nine = lists:rumerge3([3,2,1],[6,5,4],[9,8,7]),
  853:     Nine = lists:rumerge3([9,8,7],[6,5,4],[3,2,1]),
  854:     Nine = lists:rumerge3([6,5,4],[9,8,7],[3,2,1]),
  855: 
  856:     [3,2,1] = lists:rumerge3([3,2,1],[3,2,1],[3,2,1]),
  857:     [4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge3([4,3,2],[3,2,1],[3,2,1]),
  858:     [5,4,3,2,1] = lists:rumerge3([4,3,2],[5,4,3,2],[5,4,3,2,1]),
  859:     [6,5,4,3,2] = lists:rumerge3([4,3,2],[5,4,3,2],[6,5,4,3]),
  860: 
  861:     L1 = [c,d,e],
  862:     L2 = [b,c,d],
  863:     true =
  864: 	lists:umerge(L1, L2) == 
  865: 	lists:reverse(lists:rumerge(lists:reverse(L1), lists:reverse(L2))),
  866: 
  867:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rumerge3([], [], Singleton)),
  868:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rumerge3([], Singleton, [])),
  869:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rumerge3(Singleton, [], [])),
  870: 
  871:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3(a, b, c)),
  872:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3(a, b, [])),
  873:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3(a, [], c)),
  874:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3(a, [], [])),
  875:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3([], b, [])),
  876:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3([], [], c)),
  877:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3(a, b, [1, 2, 3])),
  878:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3(a, [1, 2, 3], c)),
  879:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3(a, [1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6])),
  880:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3([1, 2, 3], b, [4, 5, 6])),
  881:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge3([1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], c)),
  882: 
  883:     ok.
  884: 
  885: %% usort/1 on big randomized lists.
  886: usort_rand(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  887:     ok = ucheck(biglist(10)),
  888:     ok = ucheck(biglist(100)),
  889:     ok = ucheck(biglist(1000)),
  890:     ok = ucheck(biglist(10000)),
  891: 
  892:     ok = ucheck(ubiglist(10)),
  893:     ok = ucheck(ubiglist(100)),
  894:     ok = ucheck(ubiglist(1000)),
  895:     ok = ucheck(ubiglist(10000)),
  896:     ok.
  897: 
  898: ucheck([]) ->
  899:     ok;
  900: ucheck(L) ->
  901:     S = lists:usort(L),
  902:     case ucheck(hd(S), tl(S)) of
  903: 	ok ->
  904: 	    ok;
  905: 	_ ->
  906: 	    io:format("~w~n", [L]),
  907: 	    erlang:error(ucheck)
  908:     end.
  909: 
  910: ucheck(_A, []) ->
  911:     ok;
  912: ucheck(A, [B | L]) when A < B ->
  913:     ucheck(B, L);
  914: ucheck(_A, _L) ->
  915:     no.
  916: 
  917: %% Key merge two lists.
  918: keymerge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  919: 
  920:     Singleton = id([{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}]),
  921:     Two = [{1,a},{2,b}],
  922:     Six = [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f}],
  923: 
  924:     %% 2-way keymerge
  925:     [] = lists:keymerge(1, [], []),
  926:     Two = lists:keymerge(1, Two, []),
  927:     Two = lists:keymerge(1, [], Two),
  928:     Six = lists:keymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e}], [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}]),
  929:     Six = lists:keymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e}]),
  930:     Six = lists:keymerge(1, [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}], [{4,d},{5,e},{6,f}]),
  931:     Six = lists:keymerge(1, [{4,d},{5,e},{6,f}], [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}]),
  932:     Six = lists:keymerge(1, [{1,a},{2,b},{5,e}],[{3,c},{4,d},{6,f}]),
  933:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}] =
  934: 	lists:keymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}], [{2,b}]),
  935:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}] =
  936: 	lists:keymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}], [{2,b},{4,d}]),
  937:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}] =
  938: 	lists:keymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}], [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}]),
  939:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}] =
  940: 	lists:keymerge(1, [{2,b}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}]),
  941:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}] =
  942: 	lists:keymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}]),
  943:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}] =
  944: 	lists:keymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}]),
  945: 
  946:     [{b,2},{c,11},{c,12},{c,21},{c,22},{e,5}] =
  947: 	lists:keymerge(1,[{c,11},{c,12},{e,5}], [{b,2},{c,21},{c,22}]),
  948: 
  949:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:keymerge(1, Singleton, [])),
  950:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:keymerge(1, [], Singleton)),
  951: 
  952:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keymerge(1, a, b)),
  953:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keymerge(1, a, [])),
  954:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keymerge(1, [], b)),
  955:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keymerge(1, a, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}])),
  956:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keymerge(1, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}], b)),
  957: 
  958:     ok.
  959: 
  960: %% Reverse key merge two lists.
  961: rkeymerge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  962: 
  963:     Singleton = id([{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}]),
  964:     Two = [{2,b},{1,a}],
  965:     Six = [{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}],
  966: 
  967:     %% 2-way reversed keymerge
  968:     [] = lists:rkeymerge(1, [], []),
  969:     Two = lists:rkeymerge(1, Two, []),
  970:     Two = lists:rkeymerge(1, [], Two),
  971:     Six = lists:rkeymerge(1, [{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}]),
  972:     Six = lists:rkeymerge(1, [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}], [{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
  973:     Six = lists:rkeymerge(1, [{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}], [{6,f},{5,e},{4,d}]),
  974:     Six = lists:rkeymerge(1, [{6,f},{5,e},{4,d}], [{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}]),
  975:     Six = lists:rkeymerge(1, [{4,d},{3,c},{2,b}],[{6,f},{5,e},{1,a}]),
  976:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}] =
  977: 	lists:rkeymerge(1, [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f}]),
  978:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{1,a}] =
  979: 	lists:rkeymerge(1, [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f},{4,d}]),
  980:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
  981: 	lists:rkeymerge(1, [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}]),
  982:     [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
  983: 	lists:rkeymerge(1, [{2,b}], [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
  984:     [{7,g},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
  985: 	lists:rkeymerge(1, [{4,d},{2,b}], [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
  986:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
  987: 	lists:rkeymerge(1, [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}], [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
  988: 
  989:     L1 = [{c,11},{c,12},{e,5}],
  990:     L2 = [{b,2},{c,21},{c,22}],
  991:     true =
  992: 	lists:keymerge(1, L1, L2) == 
  993: 	lists:reverse(lists:rkeymerge(1,lists:reverse(L1), 
  994: 				      lists:reverse(L2))),
  995: 
  996:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rkeymerge(1, Singleton, [])),
  997:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rkeymerge(1, [], Singleton)),
  998: 
  999:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rkeymerge(1, a, b)),
 1000:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rkeymerge(1, a, [])),
 1001:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rkeymerge(1, [], b)),
 1002:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rkeymerge(1, a, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}])),
 1003:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rkeymerge(1, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}], b)),
 1004: 
 1005:     ok.
 1006: 
 1007: keysort_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1008:     ok = keysort_check(1, [], []),
 1009:     ok = keysort_check(1, [{a,b}], [{a,b}]),
 1010:     ok = keysort_check(1, [{a,b},{a,b}], [{a,b},{a,b}]),
 1011:     ok = keysort_check(1, [{a,b},{b,c}], [{a,b},{b,c}]),
 1012:     ok = keysort_check(1, [{b,c},{a,b}], [{a,b},{b,c}]),
 1013:     ok = keysort_check(1,
 1014: 		       [{1,e},{3,f},{2,y},{0,z},{x,14}],
 1015: 		       [{0,z},{1,e},{2,y},{3,f},{x,14}]),
 1016:     ok = keysort_check(1,
 1017: 		       [{1,a},{1,a},{1,a},{1,a}],
 1018: 		       [{1,a},{1,a},{1,a},{1,a}]),
 1019: 
 1020:     [{b,1},{c,1}] = lists:keysort(1, [{c,1},{b,1}]),
 1021:     [{a,0},{b,2},{c,3},{d,4}] =
 1022: 	lists:keysort(1, [{d,4},{c,3},{b,2},{a,0}]),
 1023:     [{a,0},{b,1},{b,2},{c,1}] =
 1024: 	lists:keysort(1, [{c,1},{b,1},{b,2},{a,0}]),
 1025:     [{a,0},{b,1},{b,2},{c,1},{d,4}] =
 1026: 	lists:keysort(1, [{c,1},{b,1},{b,2},{a,0},{d,4}]),
 1027: 
 1028:     SFun = fun(L) -> fun(X) -> keysort_check(1, X, L) end end,
 1029:     L1 = [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}],
 1030:     lists:foreach(SFun(L1), perms(L1)),
 1031:     L2 = [{1,a},{1,a},{2,b}],
 1032:     lists:foreach(SFun(L2), perms(L2)),
 1033:     L3 = [{1,a},{1,a},{1,a},{2,b}],
 1034:     lists:foreach(SFun(L3), perms(L3)),
 1035:     L4 = [{a,1},{a,1},{b,2},{b,2},{c,3},{d,4},{e,5},{f,6}],
 1036:     lists:foreach(SFun(L4), perms(L4)),
 1037: 
 1038:     ok.
 1039: 
 1040: %% keysort should exit when given bad arguments
 1041: keysort_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1042:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(0, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1043:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(3, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1044:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(1.5, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1045:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(x, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1046:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(x, [])),
 1047:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(x, [{1,b}])),
 1048:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(1, [a,b])),
 1049:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keysort(1, [{1,b} | {1,c}])),
 1050:     ok.
 1051: 
 1052: %% keysort with other key than first element
 1053: keysort_i(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1054:     ok = keysort_check(2, [{a,2},{b,1},{c,3}], [{b,1},{a,2},{c,3}]),
 1055:     ok.
 1056: 
 1057: %% keysort on big randomized lists
 1058: keysort_rand(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1059:     ok = keysort_check3(1, biglist(10)),
 1060:     ok = keysort_check3(1, biglist(100)),
 1061:     ok = keysort_check3(1, biglist(1000)),
 1062:     ok = keysort_check3(1, biglist(10000)),
 1063: 
 1064:     ok = keysort_check3(2, biglist(10)),
 1065:     ok = keysort_check3(2, biglist(100)),
 1066:     ok = keysort_check3(2, biglist(1000)),
 1067:     ok = keysort_check3(2, biglist(10000)),
 1068:     ok.
 1069: 
 1070: %%% Keysort a list, check that the returned list is what we expected,
 1071: %%% and that it is actually sorted.
 1072: keysort_check(I, Input, Expected) ->
 1073:     Expected = lists:keysort(I, Input),
 1074:     check_sorted(I, Input, Expected).
 1075: 
 1076: keysort_check3(I, Input) ->
 1077:     check_sorted(I, 3, Input, lists:keysort(I, Input)).
 1078: 
 1079: check_sorted(I, Input, L) ->
 1080:     check_sorted(I, I, Input, L).
 1081: 
 1082: %%% Check that a list is keysorted by element I. Elements comparing equal
 1083: %%% should be sorted according to element J.
 1084: check_sorted(_I, _J, _Input, []) ->
 1085:     ok;
 1086: check_sorted(I, J, Input, [A | Rest]) ->
 1087:     case catch check_sorted1(I, J, A, Rest) of
 1088: 	{'EXIT', _} ->
 1089: 	    io:format("~w~n", [Input]),
 1090: 	    erlang:error(check_sorted);
 1091: 	Reply ->
 1092: 	    Reply
 1093:     end.
 1094: 
 1095: check_sorted1(_I, _J, _A, []) ->
 1096:     ok;
 1097: check_sorted1(I, J, A, [B | Rest]) ->
 1098:     ok = keycompare(I, J, A, B),
 1099:     check_sorted1(I, J, B, Rest).
 1100: 
 1101: keycompare(I, _J, A, B) when element(I, A) < element(I, B) ->
 1102:     ok;
 1103: keycompare(I, J, A, B) when element(I, A) == element(I, B), 
 1104: 			    element(J, A) =< element(J, B) ->
 1105:     ok.
 1106: 
 1107: 
 1108: %% Merge two lists while removing duplicates.
 1109: ukeymerge(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1110: 
 1111:     Singleton = id([{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}]),
 1112:     Two = [{1,a},{2,b}],
 1113:     Six = [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f}],
 1114: 
 1115:     %% 2-way unique keymerge
 1116:     [] = lists:ukeymerge(1, [], []),
 1117:     Two = lists:ukeymerge(1, Two, []),
 1118:     Two = lists:ukeymerge(1, [], Two),
 1119:     [] = lists:ukeymerge(1, [], []),
 1120:     Two = lists:ukeymerge(1, Two, []),
 1121:     Two = lists:ukeymerge(1, [], Two),
 1122:     Six = lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e}], [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}]),
 1123:     Six = lists:ukeymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e}]),
 1124:     Six = lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}], [{4,d},{5,e},{6,f}]),
 1125:     Six = lists:ukeymerge(1, [{4,d},{5,e},{6,f}], [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}]),
 1126:     Six = lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{2,b},{5,e}],[{3,c},{4,d},{6,f}]),
 1127:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1128: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}], [{2,b}]),
 1129:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1130: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}], [{2,b},{4,d}]),
 1131:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}] =
 1132: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}], [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}]),
 1133:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1134: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{2,b}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}]),
 1135:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1136: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}]),
 1137:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}] =
 1138: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}], [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}]),
 1139: 
 1140:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1141: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}], [{2,b}]),
 1142:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1143: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}], 
 1144: 			[{2,b},{4,d}]),
 1145:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}] =
 1146: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1,a},{3,c},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}], 
 1147: 			[{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}]),
 1148:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1149: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{2,b}], [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{5,e},{7,g}]),
 1150:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}] =
 1151: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d}], 
 1152: 			[{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{7,g}]),
 1153:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}] =
 1154: 	lists:ukeymerge(1, [{2,b},{4,d},{6,f}], 
 1155: 			[{1,a},{2,b},{3,c},{4,d},{5,e},{6,f},{7,g}]),
 1156: 
 1157:     L1 = [{a,1},{a,3},{a,5},{a,7}],
 1158:     L2 = [{b,1},{b,3},{b,5},{b,7}],
 1159:     L1 = lists:ukeymerge(2, L1, L2),
 1160: 
 1161:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:ukeymerge(1, Singleton, [])),
 1162:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:ukeymerge(1, [], Singleton)),
 1163: 
 1164:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeymerge(1, a, b)),
 1165:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeymerge(1, a, [])),
 1166:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeymerge(1, [], b)),
 1167:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeymerge(1, a, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}])),
 1168:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeymerge(1, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}], b)),
 1169: 
 1170:     ok.
 1171: 
 1172: %% Reverse merge two lists while removing duplicates.
 1173: rukeymerge(Conf) when is_list(Conf) ->
 1174: 
 1175:     Singleton = id([{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}]),
 1176:     Two = [{2,b},{1,a}],
 1177:     Six = [{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}],
 1178: 
 1179:     %% 2-way reversed unique keymerge
 1180:     [] = lists:rukeymerge(1, [], []),
 1181:     Two = lists:rukeymerge(1, Two, []),
 1182:     Two = lists:rukeymerge(1, [], Two),
 1183:     Six = lists:rukeymerge(1, [{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}]),
 1184:     Six = lists:rukeymerge(1, [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}], [{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
 1185:     Six = lists:rukeymerge(1, [{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}], [{6,f},{5,e},{4,d}]),
 1186:     Six = lists:rukeymerge(1, [{6,f},{5,e},{4,d}], [{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}]),
 1187:     Six = lists:rukeymerge(1, [{4,d},{3,c},{2,b}],[{6,f},{5,e},{1,a}]),
 1188:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}] =
 1189: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f}]),
 1190:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{1,a}] =
 1191: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f},{4,d}]),
 1192:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1193: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}]),
 1194:     [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1195: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{2,b}], [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
 1196:     [{7,g},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1197: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{4,d},{2,b}], [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
 1198:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1199: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}], [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}]),
 1200: 
 1201:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}] =
 1202: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{3,c},{1,a}], [{6,f}]),
 1203:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{1,a}] =
 1204: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{1,a}], 
 1205: 			 [{6,f},{4,d}]),
 1206:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1207: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}], 
 1208: 			 [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}]),
 1209:     [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1210: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{2,b}], [{7,g},{5,e},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}]),
 1211:     [{7,g},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1212: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{4,d},{2,b}], 
 1213: 			 [{7,g},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}]),
 1214:     [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}] =
 1215: 	lists:rukeymerge(1, [{6,f},{4,d},{2,b}], 
 1216: 			 [{7,g},{6,f},{5,e},{4,d},{3,c},{2,b},{1,a}]),
 1217: 
 1218:     L1 = [{a,1},{a,3},{a,5},{a,7}],
 1219:     L2 = [{b,1},{b,3},{b,5},{b,7}],
 1220:     true =
 1221: 	lists:ukeymerge(2, L1, L2) == 
 1222: 	lists:reverse(lists:rukeymerge(2, lists:reverse(L1), 
 1223: 				       lists:reverse(L2))),
 1224: 
 1225:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rukeymerge(1, Singleton, [])),
 1226:     true = erts_debug:same(Singleton, lists:rukeymerge(1, [], Singleton)),
 1227: 
 1228:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rukeymerge(1, a, b)),
 1229:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rukeymerge(1, a, [])),
 1230:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rukeymerge(1, [], b)),
 1231:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rukeymerge(1, a, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}])),
 1232:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rukeymerge(1, [{1, a}, {2, b}, {3, c}], b)),
 1233: 
 1234:     ok.
 1235: 
 1236: ukeysort_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1237:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [], []),
 1238:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [{a,b}], [{a,b}]),
 1239:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [{a,b},{a,b}], [{a,b}]),
 1240:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [{a,b},{b,c}], [{a,b},{b,c}]),
 1241:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [{b,c},{a,b}], [{a,b},{b,c}]),
 1242:     ok = ukeysort_check(1,
 1243: 			[{1,e},{3,f},{2,y},{0,z},{x,14}],
 1244: 			[{0,z},{1,e},{2,y},{3,f},{x,14}]),
 1245:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, [{1,a},{1,a},{1,a},{1,a}], [{1,a}]),
 1246: 
 1247:     L1 = [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a}],
 1248:     L1u = lists:ukeysort(1, L1),
 1249:     L2 = [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a}],
 1250:     L2u = lists:ukeysort(1, L2),
 1251:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, L1, L2),
 1252: 			lists:ukeymerge(1, L1u, L2u)),
 1253:     L3 = [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a},{2,a}],
 1254:     L3u = lists:ukeysort(1, L3),
 1255:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, L3, L2),
 1256: 			lists:ukeymerge(1, L3u, L2u)),
 1257:     L4 = [{1,b},{1,a}],
 1258:     L4u = lists:ukeysort(1, L4),
 1259:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, L1, L4),
 1260: 			lists:ukeymerge(1, L1u, L4u)),
 1261:     L5 = [{1,a},{1,b},{1,a},{2,a}],
 1262:     L5u = lists:ukeysort(1, L5),
 1263:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, [], L5),
 1264: 			lists:ukeymerge(1, [], L5u)),
 1265:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, L5, []),
 1266: 			lists:ukeymerge(1, L5u, [])),
 1267:     L6 = [{3,a}],
 1268:     L6u = lists:ukeysort(1, L6),
 1269:     ok = ukeysort_check(1, lists:keymerge(1, L5, L6),
 1270: 			lists:ukeymerge(1, L5u, L6u)),
 1271: 
 1272:     [{b,1},{c,1}] = lists:ukeysort(1, [{c,1},{c,1},{c,1},{c,1},{b,1}]),
 1273:     [{a,0},{b,2},{c,3},{d,4}] =
 1274: 	lists:ukeysort(1, [{d,4},{c,3},{b,2},{b,2},{a,0}]),
 1275:     [{a,0},{b,1},{c,1}] =
 1276: 	lists:ukeysort(1, [{c,1},{b,1},{b,1},{b,2},{b,2},{a,0}]),
 1277:     [{a,0},{b,1},{c,1},{d,4}] =
 1278: 	lists:ukeysort(1, [{c,1},{b,1},{b,2},{a,0},{a,0},{d,4},{d,4}]),
 1279: 
 1280:     SFun = fun(L) -> fun(X) -> ukeysort_check(2, X, L) end end,
 1281:     PL = [{a,1},{b,2},{c,3},{d,4},{e,5},{f,6}],
 1282:     Ps = perms([{a,1},{b,2},{c,3},{d,4},{e,5},{f,6},{b,2},{a,1}]),
 1283:     lists:foreach(SFun(PL), Ps),
 1284: 
 1285:     M1L = [{1,a},{1,a},{2,b}],
 1286:     M1s = [{1,a},{2,b}],
 1287:     lists:foreach(SFun(M1s), perms(M1L)),
 1288:     M2L = [{1,a},{2,b},{2,b}],
 1289:     M2s = [{1,a},{2,b}],
 1290:     lists:foreach(SFun(M2s), perms(M2L)),
 1291:     M3 = [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}],
 1292:     lists:foreach(SFun(M3), perms(M3)),
 1293: 
 1294:     ok.
 1295: 
 1296: %% ukeysort should exit when given bad arguments.
 1297: ukeysort_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1298:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(0, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1299:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(3, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1300:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(1.5, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1301:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(x, [{1,b},{1,c}])),
 1302:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(x, [])),
 1303:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(x, [{1,b}])),
 1304:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(1, [a,b])),
 1305:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:ukeysort(1, [{1,b} | {1,c}])),
 1306:     ok.
 1307: 
 1308: %% ukeysort with other key than first element.
 1309: ukeysort_i(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1310:     ok = ukeysort_check(2, [{a,2},{b,1},{c,3}], [{b,1},{a,2},{c,3}]),
 1311:     ok.
 1312: 
 1313: %% ukeysort on big randomized lists.
 1314: ukeysort_rand(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1315:     ok = ukeysort_check3(2, biglist(10)),
 1316:     ok = ukeysort_check3(2, biglist(100)),
 1317:     ok = ukeysort_check3(2, biglist(1000)),
 1318:     ok = ukeysort_check3(2, biglist(10000)),
 1319: 
 1320:     ok = gen_ukeysort_check(1, ubiglist(10)),
 1321:     ok = gen_ukeysort_check(1, ubiglist(100)),
 1322:     ok = gen_ukeysort_check(1, ubiglist(1000)),
 1323:     ok = gen_ukeysort_check(1, ubiglist(10000)),
 1324:     ok.
 1325: 
 1326: %% Check that ukeysort/2 is stable and correct relative keysort/2.
 1327: %% (this is not affected by the fact that keysort/2 is no longer really 
 1328: %%  stable; ucheck_stability/1 checks ukeysort/2 (and usort/1, of course))
 1329: gen_ukeysort_check(I, Input) ->
 1330:     U = lists:ukeysort(I, Input),
 1331:     S = lists:keysort(I, Input),
 1332:     case U == no_dups_keys(S, I) of
 1333: 	true ->
 1334: 	    ok;
 1335: 	false ->
 1336: 	    io:format("~w~n", [Input]),
 1337: 	    erlang:error(gen_ukeysort_check)
 1338:     end.
 1339: 
 1340: %%% Uniquely keysort a list, check that the returned list is what we
 1341: %%% expected, and that it is actually sorted.
 1342: ukeysort_check(I, Input, Expected) ->
 1343:     Expected = lists:ukeysort(I, Input),
 1344:     ucheck_sorted(I, Input, Expected).
 1345: 
 1346: ukeysort_check3(I, Input) ->
 1347:     ucheck_sorted(I, 3, Input, lists:ukeysort(I, Input)).
 1348: 
 1349: ucheck_sorted(I, Input, L) ->
 1350:     ucheck_sorted(I, I, Input, L).
 1351: 
 1352: %%% Check that a list is ukeysorted by element I. Elements comparing
 1353: %%% equal should be sorted according to element J.
 1354: ucheck_sorted(_I, _J, _Input, []) ->
 1355:     ok;
 1356: ucheck_sorted(I, J, Input, [A | Rest]) ->
 1357:     case catch ucheck_sorted1(I, J, A, Rest) of
 1358: 	{'EXIT', _} ->
 1359: 	    io:format("~w~n", [Input]),
 1360: 	    erlang:error(ucheck_sorted);
 1361: 	Reply ->
 1362: 	    Reply
 1363:     end.
 1364: 
 1365: ucheck_sorted1(_I, _J, _A, []) ->
 1366:     ok;
 1367: ucheck_sorted1(I, J, A, [B | Rest]) ->
 1368:     ok = ukeycompare(I, J, A, B),
 1369:     ucheck_sorted1(I, J, B, Rest).
 1370: 
 1371: ukeycompare(I, _J, A, B) when element(I, A) < element(I, B) ->
 1372:     ok;
 1373: ukeycompare(I, J, A, B) when A =/= B,
 1374: 			     element(I, A) == element(I, B), 
 1375: 			     element(J, A) =< element(J, B) ->
 1376:     ok.
 1377: 
 1378: %%%------------------------------------------------------------
 1379: %%% Generate lists of given length, containing 3-tuples with
 1380: %%% random integer elements in the range 0..44 as elements 1 and 2.
 1381: %%% Element 3 in the tuple is the position of the tuple in the list.
 1382: 
 1383: biglist(N) ->
 1384:     rand:seed(exsplus),
 1385:     biglist(N, []).
 1386: 
 1387: biglist(0, L) ->
 1388:     L;
 1389: biglist(N, L) ->
 1390:     E = random_tuple(45, N),
 1391:     biglist(N-1, [E|L]).
 1392: 
 1393: %%%------------------------------------------------------------
 1394: %%% Generate lists of given length, containing 2-tuples with
 1395: %%% random integer elements in the range 0..10 as element 1.
 1396: %%% Element 2 in the tuple is a random integer in the range 0..5.
 1397: %%% No sequence number.
 1398: 
 1399: ubiglist(N) ->
 1400:     rand:seed(exsplus),
 1401:     ubiglist(N, []).
 1402: 
 1403: ubiglist(0, L) ->
 1404:     L;
 1405: ubiglist(N, L) ->
 1406:     E = urandom_tuple(11, 6),
 1407:     ubiglist(N-1, [E|L]).
 1408: 
 1409: urandom_tuple(N, I) ->
 1410:     R1 = randint(N),
 1411:     R2 = randint(I),
 1412:     {R1, R2}.
 1413: 
 1414: random_tuple(N, Seq) ->
 1415:     R1 = randint(N),
 1416:     R2 = randint(N),
 1417:     {R1, R2, Seq}.
 1418: 
 1419: randint(N) ->
 1420:     trunc(rand:uniform() * N).
 1421: 
 1422: %% The first "duplicate" is kept.
 1423: no_dups_keys([], _I) ->
 1424:     [];
 1425: no_dups_keys([H | T], I) ->
 1426:     no_dups_keys(H, T, [], I).
 1427: 
 1428: no_dups_keys(H, [H1 | T], L, I) when element(I, H) == element(I, H1) ->
 1429:     no_dups_keys(H, T, L, I);
 1430: no_dups_keys(H, [H1 | T], L, I) ->
 1431:     no_dups_keys(H1, T, [H | L], I);
 1432: no_dups_keys(H, [], L, _I) ->
 1433:     lists:reverse([H | L]).
 1434: 
 1435: perms([]) ->
 1436:     [[]];
 1437: perms(L) ->
 1438:     [[H|T] || H <- L, T <- perms(L--[H])].
 1439: 
 1440: %%%------------------------------------------------------------
 1441: %%% Test the sort routines with randomly generated lists.
 1442: 
 1443: -record(state, {sort = 0, usort = 0}).
 1444: 
 1445: %% Run it interactively. 'stop' or 'info' recognized commands.
 1446: sort_loop() ->
 1447:     sort_loop(5000).
 1448: 
 1449: sort_loop(N) when is_integer(N), N > 0 ->
 1450:     Pid = spawn_link(?MODULE, sloop, [N]),
 1451:     sort_loop_1(Pid).
 1452: 
 1453: sort_loop_1(Pid) ->
 1454:     case io:get_line('? ') of
 1455: 	eof ->
 1456: 	    ok;
 1457: 	"stop\n" ->
 1458: 	    Pid ! {self(), stop},
 1459: 	    receive {Pid, S} -> display_state(S) end;
 1460: 	"info\n" ->
 1461: 	    Pid ! {self(), info},
 1462: 	    receive {Pid, S} -> display_state(S) end,
 1463: 	    sort_loop_1(Pid);
 1464: 	_Other ->
 1465: 	    sort_loop_1(Pid)
 1466:     end.
 1467: 
 1468: sloop(N) ->
 1469:     rand:seed(exsplus),
 1470:     sloop(N, #state{}).
 1471: 
 1472: sloop(N, S) ->
 1473:     receive
 1474: 	{From, stop} ->
 1475: 	    From ! {self(), S};
 1476: 	{From, info} ->
 1477: 	    From ! {self(), S},
 1478: 	    sloop(N, S)
 1479:     after 0 ->
 1480: 	    Len = randint(N),
 1481: 	    NS = case randint(3) of
 1482: 		     0 ->
 1483: 			 BL = biglist(Len, []),
 1484: 			 ok = check(BL),
 1485: 			 ok = keysort_check3(1, BL),
 1486: 			 S#state{sort = S#state.sort + 1};
 1487: 		     1 ->
 1488: 			 BL = ubiglist(Len, []),
 1489: 			 ok = ucheck(BL),
 1490: 			 ok = gen_ukeysort_check(1, BL),
 1491: 			 S#state{usort = S#state.usort + 1}
 1492: 		 end,
 1493: 	    sloop(N, NS)
 1494:     end.
 1495: 
 1496: display_state(S) ->    
 1497:     io:format("sort:   ~p~n", [S#state.sort]),
 1498:     io:format("usort:  ~p~n", [S#state.usort]).
 1499: 
 1500: %%%------------------------------------------------------------
 1501: 
 1502: 
 1503: %% Test for infinite loop (OTP-2404).
 1504: seq_loop(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1505:     _ = (catch lists:seq(1, 5, -1)),
 1506:     ok.
 1507: 
 1508: %% Non-error cases for seq/2.
 1509: seq_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1510:     [1,2,3] = lists:seq(1,3),
 1511:     [1] = lists:seq(1,1),
 1512:     Big = 748274827583793785928592859,
 1513:     Big1 = Big+1,
 1514:     Big2 = Big+2,
 1515:     [Big, Big1, Big2] = lists:seq(Big, Big+2),
 1516:     ok.
 1517: 
 1518: %% Error cases for seq/2.
 1519: seq_2_e(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1520:     seq_error([4, 2]),
 1521:     seq_error([1, a]),
 1522:     seq_error([1.0, 2.0]),
 1523:     ok.
 1524: 
 1525: seq_error(Args) ->
 1526:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch apply(lists, seq, Args)).
 1527: 
 1528: %% Non-error cases for seq/3.
 1529: seq_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1530:     [1,2,3] = lists:seq(1,3,1),
 1531:     [1] = lists:seq(1,1,1),
 1532:     Big = 748274827583793785928592859,
 1533:     Big1 = Big+1,
 1534:     Big2 = Big+2,
 1535:     [Big, Big1, Big2] = lists:seq(Big, Big+2,1),
 1536: 
 1537:     [3,2,1] = lists:seq(3,1,-1),
 1538:     [1] = lists:seq(1,1,-1),
 1539: 
 1540:     [3,1] = lists:seq(3,1,-2),
 1541:     [1] = lists:seq(1, 10, 10),
 1542:     [1, 4, 7, 10, 13, 16, 19] = lists:seq(1, 19, 3),
 1543:     [1, 4, 7, 10, 13, 16, 19] = lists:seq(1, 20, 3),
 1544:     [1, 4, 7, 10, 13, 16, 19] = lists:seq(1, 21, 3),
 1545: 
 1546:     [1] = lists:seq(1, 1, 0),		%OTP-2613
 1547:     ok.
 1548: 
 1549: %% Error cases for seq/3.
 1550: seq_3_e(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1551:     seq_error([4, 2, 1]),
 1552:     seq_error([3, 5, -1]),
 1553:     seq_error([1, a, 1]),
 1554:     seq_error([1.0, 2.0, 1]),
 1555: 
 1556:     seq_error([1, 3, 1.0]),
 1557:     seq_error([1, 3, a]),
 1558:     seq_error([1, 3, 0]),
 1559: 
 1560:     seq_error([a, a, 0]),
 1561:     ok.
 1562: 
 1563: %% OTP-7230. seq/1,2 returns the empty list.
 1564: otp_7230(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1565:     From = -10,
 1566:     To = 10,
 1567:     StepFrom = -10,
 1568:     StepTo = 10,
 1569: 
 1570:     L = lists:seq(From, To),
 1571:     SL = lists:seq(StepFrom, StepTo),
 1572:     [] =
 1573: 	[{F, T, S} ||
 1574: 	    F <- L, T <- L, S <- SL,
 1575: 	    not check_seq(F, T, S, catch lists:seq(F, T, S))
 1576: 		orelse
 1577: 		S =:= 1 andalso not check_seq(F, T, S, catch lists:seq(F, T))
 1578:         ].
 1579: 
 1580: check_seq(From, To, 0, R) ->
 1581:     From =:= To andalso R =:= [From]
 1582: 	orelse
 1583: 	From =/= To andalso is_tuple(R) andalso element(1, R) =:= 'EXIT';
 1584: check_seq(From, To, Step, []) when Step =/= 0 ->
 1585:     0 =:= property(From, To, Step)
 1586: 	andalso
 1587: 	  (
 1588: 	  Step > 0 andalso To < From andalso From-To =< Step
 1589: 	  orelse
 1590: 	  Step < 0 andalso To > From andalso To-From =< -Step
 1591: 	 );
 1592: check_seq(From, To, Step, R) when R =/= [], To < From, Step > 0 ->
 1593:     is_tuple(R) andalso element(1, R) =:= 'EXIT';
 1594: check_seq(From, To, Step, R) when R =/= [], To > From, Step < 0 ->
 1595:     is_tuple(R) andalso element(1, R) =:= 'EXIT';
 1596: check_seq(From, To, Step, L) when is_list(L), L =/= [], Step =/= 0 ->
 1597:     First = hd(L),
 1598:     Last = lists:last(L),
 1599:     Min = lists:min(L),
 1600:     Max = lists:max(L),
 1601: 
 1602:     [] =:= [E || E <- L, not is_integer(E)]
 1603: 	andalso
 1604:     %% The difference between two consecutive elements is Step:
 1605: 	begin
 1606: 	    LS = [First-Step]++L,
 1607: 	    LR = L++[Last+Step],
 1608: 	    [Step] =:= lists:usort([B-A || {A,B} <- lists:zip(LS, LR)])
 1609: 	end
 1610: 	andalso
 1611:     %% The first element of L is From:
 1612: 	From =:= First
 1613: 	andalso
 1614:     %% No element outside the given interval:
 1615: 	Min >= lists:min([From, To])
 1616: 	andalso
 1617: 	Max =< lists:max([From, To])
 1618: 	andalso
 1619:     %% All elements are present:
 1620: 	abs(To-Last) < abs(Step)
 1621: 	andalso
 1622: 	length(L) =:= property(From, To, Step);
 1623: check_seq(_From, _To, _Step, _R) ->
 1624:     false.
 1625: 
 1626: property(From, To, Step) ->
 1627:     ((To-From+Step) div Step).
 1628: 
 1629: %%%------------------------------------------------------------
 1630: 
 1631: 
 1632: -define(sublist_error2(X,Y), {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:sublist(X,Y))).
 1633: -define(sublist_error3(X,Y,Z), {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:sublist(X,Y,Z))).
 1634: 
 1635: sublist_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1636:     [] = lists:sublist([], 0),
 1637:     [] = lists:sublist([], 1),
 1638:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 0),
 1639:     [a] = lists:sublist([a], 1),
 1640:     [a] = lists:sublist([a], 2),
 1641:     [a] = lists:sublist([a|b], 1),
 1642: 
 1643:     [a,b] = lists:sublist([a,b|c], 2),
 1644: 
 1645:     ok.
 1646: 
 1647: %% sublist/2 error cases.
 1648: sublist_2_e(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1649:     ?sublist_error2([], -1),
 1650:     ?sublist_error2(a, -1),
 1651:     ?sublist_error2(a, 0),
 1652:     ?sublist_error2([a|b], 2),
 1653:     ?sublist_error2([a], x),
 1654:     ?sublist_error2([a], 1.5),
 1655:     ?sublist_error2([], x),
 1656:     ?sublist_error2([], 1.5),
 1657:     ok.
 1658: 
 1659: sublist_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1660:     [] = lists:sublist([], 1, 0),
 1661:     [] = lists:sublist([], 1, 1),
 1662:     [] = lists:sublist([], 2, 0),
 1663:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 1, 0),
 1664:     [a] = lists:sublist([a], 1, 1),
 1665:     [a] = lists:sublist([a], 1, 2),
 1666:     [a] = lists:sublist([a|b], 1, 1),
 1667: 
 1668:     [] = lists:sublist([], 1, 0),
 1669:     [] = lists:sublist([], 1, 1),
 1670:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 1, 0),
 1671:     [a] = lists:sublist([a], 1, 1),
 1672:     [a] = lists:sublist([a], 1, 2),
 1673:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 2, 1),
 1674:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 2, 2),
 1675:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 2, 79),
 1676:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 3, 1),
 1677:     [] = lists:sublist([a,b|c], 1, 0),
 1678:     [] = lists:sublist([a,b|c], 2, 0),
 1679:     [a] = lists:sublist([a,b|c], 1, 1),
 1680:     [b] = lists:sublist([a,b|c], 2, 1),
 1681:     [a,b] = lists:sublist([a,b|c], 1, 2),
 1682: 
 1683:     [] = lists:sublist([a], 2, 0),
 1684: 
 1685:     ok.
 1686: 
 1687: %% sublist/3 error cases
 1688: sublist_3_e(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1689:     ?sublist_error3([], 1, -1),
 1690:     ?sublist_error3(a, 1, -1),
 1691:     ?sublist_error3(a, 1, 0),
 1692:     ?sublist_error3([a|b], 1, 2),
 1693:     ?sublist_error3([a], 1, x),
 1694:     ?sublist_error3([a], 1, 1.5),
 1695:     ?sublist_error3([], 1, x),
 1696:     ?sublist_error3([], 1, 1.5),
 1697: 
 1698:     ?sublist_error3([], -1, 0),
 1699:     ?sublist_error3(a, x, -1),
 1700:     ?sublist_error3([a,b], 0.5, 1),
 1701:     ?sublist_error3([a,b], 1.5, 1),
 1702:     ?sublist_error3([a], 1, x),
 1703:     ?sublist_error3([a], 1, 1.5),
 1704:     ?sublist_error3([], 1, x),
 1705:     ?sublist_error3([], 1, 1.5),
 1706: 
 1707:     ?sublist_error3([a], 0, -1),
 1708:     ?sublist_error3([a], 1, -1),
 1709:     ?sublist_error3([a], 2, -1),
 1710:     ?sublist_error3([a], 0, 0),
 1711:     ?sublist_error3([a], 0, 1),
 1712: 
 1713:     ?sublist_error3([a,b|c], 2, 2),
 1714:     ?sublist_error3([a,b|c], 3, 0),
 1715:     ?sublist_error3([a,b|c], 3, 1),
 1716:     ok.
 1717:
