 1720: 
 1721: -define(flatten_error1(X), {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:flatten(X))).
 1722: 
 1723: %% Test lists:flatten/1,2 and lists:flatlength/1.
 1724: flatten_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1725:     [] = lists_flatten([]),
 1726:     [1,2] = lists_flatten([1,2]),
 1727:     [1,2] = lists_flatten([1,[2]]),
 1728:     [1,2] = lists_flatten([[1],2]),
 1729:     [1,2] = lists_flatten([[1],[2]]),
 1730:     [1,2] = lists_flatten([[1,2]]),
 1731:     [a,b,c,d] = lists_flatten([[a],[b,c,[d]]]),
 1732: 
 1733:     ok.
 1734: 
 1735: lists_flatten(List) ->
 1736:     Flat = lists:flatten(List),
 1737:     Flat = lists:flatten(List, []),
 1738:     Len = lists:flatlength(List),
 1739:     Len = length(Flat),
 1740:     Flat.
 1741: 
 1742: %% flatten/1 error cases
 1743: flatten_1_e(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1744:     ?flatten_error1(a),
 1745:     ?flatten_error1([a|b]),
 1746:     ?flatten_error1([[a],[b|c],[d]]),
 1747:     ok.
 1748: 
 1749: %%% [arndt] What if second arg isn't a proper list? This issue isn't
 1750: %%% clear-cut. Right now, I think that any term should be allowed.
 1751: %%% But I also wish this function didn't exist at all.
 1752: 
 1753: %% Test lists:flatten/2.
 1754: flatten_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1755:     [] = lists:flatten([], []),
 1756:     [a] = lists:flatten([a], []),
 1757:     [a,b,c,[no,flatten]] = lists:flatten([[a,[b,c]]], [[no,flatten]]),
 1758:     ok.
 1759: 
 1760: %% flatten/2 error cases.
 1761: flatten_2_e(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1762:     ok.
 1763: 
 1764: %% Test lists:zip/2, lists:unzip/1.
 1765: zip_unzip(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1766:     [] = lists:zip([], []),
 1767:     [{a,b}] = lists:zip([a], [b]),
 1768:     [{42.0,{kalle,nisse}},{a,b}] = lists:zip([42.0,a], [{kalle,nisse},b]),
 1769: 
 1770:     %% Longer lists.
 1771:     SeqA = lists:seq(45, 200),
 1772:     SeqB = [A*A || A <- SeqA],
 1773:     AB = lists:zip(SeqA, SeqB),
 1774:     SeqA = [A || {A,_} <- AB],
 1775:     SeqB = [B || {_,B} <- AB],
 1776:     {SeqA,SeqB} = lists:unzip(AB),
 1777: 
 1778:     %% Some more unzip/1.
 1779:     {[],[]} = lists:unzip([]),
 1780:     {[a],[b]} = lists:unzip([{a,b}]),
 1781:     {[a,c],[b,d]} = lists:unzip([{a,b},{c,d}]),
 1782: 
 1783:     %% Error cases.
 1784:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zip([], [b])),
 1785:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zip([a], [])),
 1786:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zip([a], [b,c])),
 1787:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zip([a], [b,c])),
 1788:     ok.
 1789: 
 1790: zip_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1791:     [] = lists:zip([], [], fail),
 1792:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip([a], [], fail)),
 1793:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip([], [c], fail)),
 1794: 
 1795:     [{a, c}] = lists:zip([a], [c], fail),
 1796:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip([a, b], [c], fail)),
 1797:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip([a], [c, d], fail)),
 1798: 
 1799:     ok.
 1800: 
 1801: zip_trim(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1802:     [] = lists:zip([], [], trim),
 1803:     [] = lists:zip([a], [], trim),
 1804:     [] = lists:zip([], [c], trim),
 1805: 
 1806:     [{a, c}] = lists:zip([a], [c], trim),
 1807:     [{a, c}] = lists:zip([a, b], [c], trim),
 1808:     [{a, c}] = lists:zip([a], [c, d], trim),
 1809: 
 1810:     ok.
 1811: 
 1812: zip_pad(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1813:     How = {pad, {x, y}},
 1814: 
 1815:     [] = lists:zip([], [], How),
 1816:     [{a, y}] = lists:zip([a], [], How),
 1817:     [{x, c}] = lists:zip([], [c], How),
 1818: 
 1819:     [{a, c}] = lists:zip([a], [c], How),
 1820:     [{a, c}, {b, y}] = lists:zip([a, b], [c], How),
 1821:     [{a, c}, {x, d}] = lists:zip([a], [c, d], How),
 1822: 
 1823:     ok.
 1824: 
 1825: %% Test lists:zip3/3, lists:unzip3/1.
 1826: zip_unzip3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1827:     [] = lists:zip3([], [], []),
 1828:     [{a,b,c}] = lists:zip3([a], [b], [c]),
 1829: 
 1830:     %% Longer lists.
 1831:     SeqA = lists:seq(45, 200),
 1832:     SeqB = [2*A || A <- SeqA],
 1833:     SeqC = [A*A || A <- SeqA],
 1834:     ABC = lists:zip3(SeqA, SeqB, SeqC),
 1835:     SeqA = [A || {A,_,_} <- ABC],
 1836:     SeqB = [B || {_,B,_} <- ABC],
 1837:     SeqC = [C || {_,_,C} <- ABC],
 1838:     {SeqA,SeqB,SeqC} = lists:unzip3(ABC),
 1839: 
 1840:     %% Some more unzip3/1.
 1841:     {[],[],[]} = lists:unzip3([]),
 1842:     {[a],[b],[c]} = lists:unzip3([{a,b,c}]),
 1843: 
 1844:     %% Error cases.
 1845:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zip3([], [], [c])),
 1846:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zip3([], [b], [])),
 1847:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zip3([a], [], [])),
 1848: 
 1849:     ok.
 1850: 
 1851: zip3_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1852:     [] = lists:zip3([], [], [], fail),
 1853:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a], [], [], fail)),
 1854:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([], [c], [], fail)),
 1855:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a], [c], [], fail)),
 1856:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([], [], [e], fail)),
 1857:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a], [], [e], fail)),
 1858:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([], [c], [e], fail)),
 1859: 
 1860:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a], [c], [e], fail),
 1861:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a, b], [c], [e], fail)),
 1862:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a], [c, d], [e], fail)),
 1863:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a, b], [c, d], [e], fail)),
 1864:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a], [c], [e, f], fail)),
 1865:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a, b], [c], [e, f], fail)),
 1866:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zip3([a], [c, d], [e, f], fail)),
 1867: 
 1868:     ok.
 1869: 
 1870: zip3_trim(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1871:     [] = lists:zip3([], [], [], trim),
 1872:     [] = lists:zip3([a], [], [], trim),
 1873:     [] = lists:zip3([], [c], [], trim),
 1874:     [] = lists:zip3([a], [c], [], trim),
 1875:     [] = lists:zip3([], [], [e], trim),
 1876:     [] = lists:zip3([a], [], [e], trim),
 1877:     [] = lists:zip3([], [c], [e], trim),
 1878: 
 1879:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a], [c], [e], trim),
 1880:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a, b], [c], [e], trim),
 1881:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a], [c, d], [e], trim),
 1882:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a, b], [c, d], [e], trim),
 1883:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a], [c], [e, f], trim),
 1884:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a, b], [c], [e, f], trim),
 1885:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a], [c, d], [e, f], trim),
 1886: 
 1887:     ok.
 1888: 
 1889: zip3_pad(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1890:     How = {pad, {x, y, z}},
 1891: 
 1892:     [] = lists:zip3([], [], [], How),
 1893:     [{a, y, z}] = lists:zip3([a], [], [], How),
 1894:     [{x, c, z}] = lists:zip3([], [c], [], How),
 1895:     [{a, c, z}] = lists:zip3([a], [c], [], How),
 1896:     [{x, y, e}] = lists:zip3([], [], [e], How),
 1897:     [{a, y, e}] = lists:zip3([a], [], [e], How),
 1898:     [{x, c, e}] = lists:zip3([], [c], [e], How),
 1899: 
 1900:     [{a, c, e}] = lists:zip3([a], [c], [e], How),
 1901:     [{a, c, e}, {b, y, z}] = lists:zip3([a, b], [c], [e], How),
 1902:     [{a, c, e}, {x, d, z}] = lists:zip3([a], [c, d], [e], How),
 1903:     [{a, c, e}, {b, d, z}] = lists:zip3([a, b], [c, d], [e], How),
 1904:     [{a, c, e}, {x, y, f}] = lists:zip3([a], [c], [e, f], How),
 1905:     [{a, c, e}, {b, y, f}] = lists:zip3([a, b], [c], [e, f], How),
 1906:     [{a, c, e}, {x, d, f}] = lists:zip3([a], [c, d], [e, f], How),
 1907: 
 1908:     ok.
 1909: 
 1910: %% Test lists:zipwith/3.
 1911: zipwith(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1912:     Zip = fun(A, B) -> [A|B] end,
 1913: 
 1914:     [] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [], []),
 1915:     [[a|b]] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [a], [b]),
 1916: 
 1917:     %% Longer lists.
 1918:     SeqA = lists:seq(77, 300),
 1919:     SeqB = [A*A || A <- SeqA],
 1920:     AB = lists:zipwith(Zip, SeqA, SeqB),
 1921:     SeqA = [A || [A|_] <- AB],
 1922:     SeqB = [B || [_|B] <- AB],
 1923: 
 1924:     %% Error cases.
 1925:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith(badfun, [], [])),
 1926:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [], [b])),
 1927:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [a], [])),
 1928:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [a], [b,c])),
 1929:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [a], [b,c])),
 1930:     ok.
 1931: 
 1932: zipwith_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1933:     Zip = fun(A, B) -> A * B end,
 1934: 
 1935:     [] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [], [], fail),
 1936:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [], fail)),
 1937:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [], [5], fail)),
 1938: 
 1939:     [2 * 5] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [5], fail),
 1940:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [2, 3], [5], fail)),
 1941:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [5, 7], fail)),
 1942: 
 1943:     ok.
 1944: 
 1945: zipwith_trim(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1946:     Zip = fun(A, B) -> A * B end,
 1947: 
 1948:     [] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [], [], trim),
 1949:     [] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [], trim),
 1950:     [] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [], [5], trim),
 1951: 
 1952:     [2 * 5] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [5], trim),
 1953:     [2 * 5] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2, 3], [5], trim),
 1954:     [2 * 5] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [5, 7], trim),
 1955: 
 1956:     ok.
 1957: 
 1958: zipwith_pad(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1959:     How = {pad, {17, 19}},
 1960: 
 1961:     Zip = fun(A, B) -> A * B end,
 1962: 
 1963:     [] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [], [], How),
 1964:     [ 2 * 19] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [], How),
 1965:     [17 *  5] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [], [5], How),
 1966: 
 1967:     [2 * 5] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [5], How),
 1968:     [2 * 5,  3 * 19] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2, 3], [5], How),
 1969:     [2 * 5, 17 *  7] = lists:zipwith(Zip, [2], [5, 7], How),
 1970: 
 1971:     ok.
 1972: 
 1973: %% Test lists:zipwith3/4.
 1974: zipwith3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1975:     Zip = fun(A, B, C) -> [A,B,C] end,
 1976: 
 1977:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [], []),
 1978:     [[a,b,c]] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [a], [b], [c]),
 1979: 
 1980:     %% Longer lists.
 1981:     SeqA = lists:seq(45, 200),
 1982:     SeqB = [2*A || A <- SeqA],
 1983:     SeqC = [A*A || A <- SeqA],
 1984:     ABC = lists:zipwith3(Zip, SeqA, SeqB, SeqC),
 1985:     SeqA = [A || [A,_,_] <- ABC],
 1986:     SeqB = [B || [_,B,_] <- ABC],
 1987:     SeqC = [C || [_,_,C] <- ABC],
 1988: 
 1989:     %% Error cases.
 1990:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(badfun, [], [], [])),
 1991:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [], [c])),
 1992:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [b], [])),
 1993:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [a], [], [])),
 1994: 
 1995:     ok.
 1996: 
 1997: zipwith3_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1998:     Zip = fun(A, B, C) -> A * B * C end,
 1999: 
 2000:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [], [], fail),
 2001:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [], [], fail)),
 2002:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [5], [], fail)),
 2003:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5], [], fail)),
 2004:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [], [11], fail)),
 2005:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [], [11], fail)),
 2006:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [5], [11], fail)),
 2007: 
 2008:     [2 * 5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5], [11], fail),
 2009:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2, 3], [5], [11], fail)),
 2010:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5, 7], [11], fail)),
 2011:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2, 3], [5, 7], [11], fail)),
 2012:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5], [11, 13], fail)),
 2013:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2, 3], [5], [11, 13], fail)),
 2014:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5, 7], [11, 13], fail)),
 2015: 
 2016:     ok.
 2017: 
 2018: zipwith3_trim(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2019:     Zip = fun(A, B, C) -> A * B * C end,
 2020: 
 2021:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [], [], trim),
 2022:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [], [], trim),
 2023:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [5], [], trim),
 2024:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [], [11], trim),
 2025:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [], [11], trim),
 2026:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [5], [11], trim),
 2027: 
 2028:     [2 * 5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5], [11], trim),
 2029:     [2 * 5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2, 3], [5], [11], trim),
 2030:     [2 * 5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5, 7], [11], trim),
 2031:     [2 * 5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5], [11, 13], trim),
 2032:     [2 * 5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2, 3], [5], [11, 13], trim),
 2033:     [2 * 5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5, 7], [11, 13], trim),
 2034: 
 2035:     ok.
 2036: 
 2037: zipwith3_pad(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2038:     How = {pad, {17, 19, 23}},
 2039: 
 2040:     Zip = fun(A, B, C) -> A * B * C end,
 2041: 
 2042:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [], [], How),
 2043:     [ 2 * 19 * 23] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [], [], How),
 2044:     [17 *  5 * 23] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [5], [], How),
 2045:     [ 2 *  5 * 23] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5], [], How),
 2046:     [17 * 19 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [], [11], How),
 2047:     [ 2 * 19 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [], [11], How),
 2048:     [17 *  5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [], [5], [11], How),
 2049: 
 2050:     [2 * 5 * 11] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5], [11], How),
 2051:     [2 * 5 * 11,  3 * 19 * 23] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2, 3], [5], [11], How),
 2052:     [2 * 5 * 11, 17 *  7 * 23] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5, 7], [11], How),
 2053:     [2 * 5 * 11,  3 *  7 * 23] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2, 3], [5, 7], [11], How),
 2054:     [2 * 5 * 11, 17 * 19 * 13] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5], [11, 13], How),
 2055:     [2 * 5 * 11,  3 * 19 * 13] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2, 3], [5], [11, 13], How),
 2056:     [2 * 5 * 11, 17 *  7 * 13] = lists:zipwith3(Zip, [2], [5, 7], [11, 13], How),
 2057: 
 2058:     ok.

 2075:     F = fun(I) -> I rem 2 =:= 0 end,
 2076:     filpart(F, [], []),

 2078:     filpart(F, [1,3,17], []),
 2079:     filpart(F, [1,2,3,17], [2]),
 2080:     filpart(F, [6,8,1,2,3,17], [6,8,2]),

 2085:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:partition(badfun, [])),
 2086:     ok.
 2087: 
 2088: filpart(F, All, Exp) ->
 2089:     Exp = lists:filter(F, All),
 2090:     Other = lists:filter(fun(E) -> not F(E) end, All),
 2091:     {Exp,Other} = lists:partition(F, All).
 2092:

 2212: %% Test lists:subtract/2 and the '--' operator.
 2213: subtract(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2214:     [] = sub([], []),
 2215:     [] = sub([], [a]),
 2216:     [] = sub([], lists:seq(1, 1024)),
 2217:     sub_non_matching([a], []),
 2218:     sub_non_matching([1,2], [make_ref()]),
 2219:     sub_non_matching(lists:seq(1, 1024), [make_ref(),make_ref()]),
 2220: 
 2221:     %% Matching subtracts.
 2222:     [] = sub([a], [a]),
 2223:     [a] = sub([a,b], [b]),
 2224:     [a] = sub([a,b], [b,c]),
 2225:     [a] = sub([a,b,c], [b,c]),
 2226:     [a] = sub([a,b,c], [b,c]),
 2227:     [d,a,a] = sub([a,b,c,d,a,a], [a,b,c]),
 2228:     [d,x,a] = sub([a,b,c,d,a,x,a], [a,b,c,a]),
 2229:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,9999,10000,20,21,22] =
 2230: 	sub(lists:seq(1, 10000)++[20,21,22], lists:seq(10, 9998)),
 2231: 
 2232:     %% ERL-986; an integer overflow relating to term comparison
 2233:     %% caused subtraction to be inconsistent.
 2234:     Ids = [2985095936,47540628,135460048,1266126295,240535295,
 2235:            115724671,161800351,4187206564,4178142725,234897063,
 2236:            14773162,6662515191,133150693,378034895,1874402262,
 2237:            3507611978,22850922,415521280,253360400,71683243],
 2238: 
 2239:     [] = id(Ids) -- id(Ids),
 2240: 
 2241:     %% Floats/integers.
 2242:     [42.0,42.0] = sub([42.0,42,42.0], [42,42,42]),
 2243:     [1,2,3,4,43.0] = sub([1,2,3,4,5,42.0,43.0], [42.0,5]),
 2244: 
 2245:     %% Crashing subtracts.
 2246:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub([], [a|b])),
 2247:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub([a], [a|b])),
 2248:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub([a|b], [])),
 2249:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub([a|b], [])),
 2250:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub([a|b], [a])),
 2251: 
 2252:     %% Trapping, both crashing and otherwise.
 2253:     [sub_trapping(N) || N <- lists:seq(0, 18)],
 2254: 
 2255:     %% The current implementation chooses which algorithm to use based on
 2256:     %% certain thresholds, and we need proper coverage for all corner cases.
 2257:     [sub_thresholds(N) || N <- lists:seq(0, 32)],
 2258: 
 2259:     %% Trapping, both crashing and otherwise.
 2260:     [sub_trapping(N) || N <- lists:seq(0, 18)],
 2261: 
 2262:     %% The current implementation chooses which algorithm to use based on
 2263:     %% certain thresholds, and we need proper coverage for all corner cases.
 2264:     [sub_thresholds(N) || N <- lists:seq(0, 32)],
 2265: 
 2266:     ok.
 2267: 
 2268: id(I) -> I.
 2269: 
 2270: sub_non_matching(A, B) ->
 2271:     A = sub(A, B).
 2272: 
 2273: sub(A, B) ->
 2274:     Res = A -- B,
 2275:     Res = lists:subtract(A, B).
 2276: 
 2277: sub_trapping(N) ->
 2278:     List = lists:duplicate(N + (1 bsl N), gurka),
 2279:     ImproperList = List ++ crash,
 2280: 
 2281:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub_trapping_1(ImproperList, [])),
 2282:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub_trapping_1(List, ImproperList)),
 2283: 
 2284:     List = List -- lists:duplicate(N + (1 bsl N), gaffel),
 2285:     ok = sub_trapping_1(List, []).
 2286: 
 2287: sub_trapping_1([], _) -> ok;
 2288: sub_trapping_1(L, R) -> sub_trapping_1(L -- R, [gurka | R]).
 2289: 
 2290: sub_thresholds(N) ->
 2291:     %% This needs to be long enough to cause trapping.
 2292:     OtherLen = 1 bsl 18,
 2293:     Other = lists:seq(0, OtherLen - 1),
 2294: 
 2295:     Disjoint = lists:seq(-N, -1),
 2296:     Subset = lists:seq(1, N),
 2297: 
 2298:     %% LHS is disjoint from RHS, so all elements must be retained.
 2299:     Disjoint = Disjoint -- Other,
 2300: 
 2301:     %% LHS is covered by RHS, so all elements must be removed.
 2302:     [] = Subset -- Other,
 2303: 
 2304:     %% RHS is disjoint from LHS, so all elements must be retained.
 2305:     Other = Other -- Disjoint,
 2306: 
 2307:     %% RHS is covered by LHS, so N elements must be removed.
 2308:     N = OtherLen - length(Other -- Subset),
 2309: 
 2310:     ok.
 2311:

 2338:     L = [1,2,3],

 2340:     [1,4,5,6] = lists:flatmap(fun(1) -> [1];
 2341: 				 (2) -> [];
 2342: 				 (3) -> [4,5,6]
 2343: 			      end, L),
 2344:     [{1,[a]},{2,[b]},{3,[c]}] =
 2345: 	lists:keymap(fun(A) -> [A] end, 2, [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}]),

 2348:     FilterMapFun = fun(1) -> true;
 2349: 		      (2) -> {true,42};
 2350: 		      (3) -> false
 2351: 		   end,
 2352:     [1,42] = lists:filtermap(FilterMapFun, L),
 2353:     [1,42] = lists:zf(FilterMapFun, L),
 2354: 
 2355:     [3,2,1] = lists:foldl(fun(E, A) -> [E|A] end, [], L),
 2356:     [1,2,3] = lists:foldr(fun(E, A) -> [E|A] end, [], L),
 2357:     {[1,4,9],[3,2,1]} = lists:mapfoldl(fun(E, A) ->
 2358: 					       {E*E,[E|A]}
 2359: 				       end, [], L),
 2360:     {[1,4,9],[1,2,3]} = lists:mapfoldr(fun(E, A) ->
 2361: 					       {E*E,[E|A]}
 2362: 				       end, [], L),
 2363: 
 2364:     true = lists:any(fun(N) -> N =:= 2 end, L),
 2365:     false = lists:any(fun(N) -> N =:= 42 end, L),
 2366: 
 2367:     true = lists:all(fun(N) -> is_integer(N) end, L),
 2368:     false = lists:all(fun(N) -> N rem 2 =:= 0 end, L),
 2369: 
 2370:     ok.

 2411: 
 2412: error_info(_Config) ->
 2413:     L = [{keyfind, [whatever, bad_position, bad_list], [{2,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 2414:          {keymember, [key, 0, bad_list], [{2,".*"}, {3,".*"}]},
 2415:          {keysearch, [key, bad_position, {no,list}], [{2,".*"}, {3,".*"}]},
 2416:          {member, [whatever, not_a_list]},
 2417:          {member, [whatever, [a|b]]},
 2418:          {reverse, [not_a_list, whatever]}
 2419:         ],
 2420:     do_error_info(L).
 2421: 
 2422: do_error_info(L0) ->
 2423:     L1 = lists:foldl(fun({_,A}, Acc) when is_integer(A) -> Acc;
 2424:                         ({F,A}, Acc) -> [{F,A,[]}|Acc];
 2425:                         ({F,A,Opts}, Acc) -> [{F,A,Opts}|Acc]
 2426:                      end, [], L0),
 2427:     Tests = ordsets:from_list([{F,length(A)} || {F,A,_} <- L1] ++
 2428:                                   [{F,A} || {F,A} <- L0, is_integer(A)]),
 2429:     Bifs0 = [{F,A} || {M,F,A} <- erlang:system_info(snifs),
 2430:                       M =:= lists,
 2431:                       A =/= 0],
 2432:     Bifs = ordsets:from_list(Bifs0),
 2433:     NYI = [{F,lists:duplicate(A, '*'),nyi} || {F,A} <- Bifs -- Tests],
 2434:     L = lists:sort(NYI ++ L1),
 2435:     error_info_lib:test_error_info(lists, L, [snifs_only]).
 2436: 
 2437: uniq_1(_Config) ->
 2438:     [] = lists:uniq([]),
 2439:     [foo] = lists:uniq([foo]),
 2440:     ["foo", "bar", "zoo"] = lists:uniq(["foo", "foo", "bar", "foo", "zoo",
 2441:                                         "foo", "bar", "zoo"]),
 2442:     [a, 1, b, 2] = lists:uniq([a, a, a, 1, b, 2, a, 2, 1]),
 2443:     [<<"home">>, "home"] = lists:uniq([<<"home">>, "home"]),
 2444:     [3.14159, 2.71828, 3.17] = lists:uniq([3.14159, 3.14159, 2.71828, 3.17]),
 2445:     [42, 42.0] = lists:uniq([42, 42.0, 42, 42.0]),
 2446:     ok.
 2447: 
 2448: uniq_2(_Config) ->
 2449:     [] = lists:uniq(fun(X) -> X end, []),
 2450:     [{42, 1}, {42.0, 99}, {a, 99}] =
 2451:         lists:uniq(fun(X) -> element(1, X) end,
 2452:                    [{42, 1}, {42.0, 99}, {a, 99}, {a, 1}, {42, 100}]),
 2453:     [1] = lists:uniq(fun(_) -> whatever end, lists:seq(1, 10)),
 2454:     ok.
